76routing_manager_impl::routing_manager_impl(routing_manager_host *_host) :
77 routing_manager_base(_host),
78 version_log_timer_(_host->get_io()),
79 if_state_running_(false),
80 sd_route_set_(false),
81 routing_running_(false),
82 status_log_timer_(_host->get_io()),
83 memory_log_timer_(_host->get_io()),
84 ep_mgr_impl_(std::make_shared<endpoint_manager_impl>(this, io_, configuration_)),
85 pending_remote_offer_id_(0),
86 last_resume_(std::chrono::steady_clock::now().min()),
87 statistics_log_timer_(_host->get_io()),
88 ignored_statistics_counter_(0)
89{
90}
91
92routing_manager_impl::~routing_manager_impl() {
93 utility::remove_lockfile(configuration_->get_network());
94 utility::reset_client_ids(configuration_->get_network());
95}

118std::string routing_manager_impl::get_env(client_t _client) const {
119
120 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_known_clients_lock(known_clients_mutex_);
121 return get_env_unlocked(_client);
122}
123
124std::string routing_manager_impl::get_env_unlocked(client_t _client) const {
125
126 auto find_client = known_clients_.find(_client);
127 if (find_client != known_clients_.end()) {
128 return find_client->second;
129 }
130 return "";
131}

156
157void routing_manager_impl::init() {
158 routing_manager_base::init(ep_mgr_impl_);
159
160 if (configuration_->is_routing_enabled()) {
161 stub_ = std::make_shared<routing_manager_stub>(this, configuration_);
162 stub_->init();
163 } else {
164 VSOMEIP_INFO << "Internal message routing disabled!";
165 }
166
167 if (configuration_->is_sd_enabled()) {
168 VSOMEIP_INFO<< "Service Discovery enabled. Trying to load module.";
169 auto its_plugin = plugin_manager::get()->get_plugin(
170 plugin_type_e::SD_RUNTIME_PLUGIN, VSOMEIP_SD_LIBRARY);
171 if (its_plugin) {
172 VSOMEIP_INFO << "Service Discovery module loaded.";
173 discovery_ = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<sd::runtime>(its_plugin)->create_service_discovery(this, configuration_);
174 discovery_->init();
175 } else {
176 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "Service Discovery module could not be loaded!";
177 std::exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
178 }
179 }
180
181#ifndef ANDROID
182 if( configuration_->is_e2e_enabled()) {
183 VSOMEIP_INFO << "E2E protection enabled.";
184
185 const char *its_e2e_module = getenv(VSOMEIP_ENV_E2E_PROTECTION_MODULE);
186 std::string plugin_name = its_e2e_module != nullptr ? its_e2e_module : VSOMEIP_E2E_LIBRARY;
187
188 auto its_plugin = plugin_manager::get()->get_plugin(plugin_type_e::APPLICATION_PLUGIN, plugin_name);
189 if (its_plugin) {
190 VSOMEIP_INFO << "E2E module loaded.";
191 e2e_provider_ = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<e2e::e2e_provider>(its_plugin);
192 }
193 }
194
195 if(e2e_provider_) {
196 std::map<e2exf::data_identifier_t, std::shared_ptr<cfg::e2e>> its_e2e_configuration = configuration_->get_e2e_configuration();
197 for (auto &identifier : its_e2e_configuration) {
198 if(!e2e_provider_->add_configuration(identifier.second)) {
199 VSOMEIP_INFO << "Unknown E2E profile: " << identifier.second->profile << ", skipping ...";
200 }
201 }
202 }
203#endif
204}
205
206void routing_manager_impl::start() {
207#if defined(__linux__) || defined(ANDROID)
208 boost::asio::ip::address its_multicast;
209 try {
210 its_multicast = boost::asio::ip::address::from_string(configuration_->get_sd_multicast());
211 } catch (...) {
212 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "Illegal multicast address \""
213 << configuration_->get_sd_multicast()
214 << "\". Please check your configuration.";
215 }
216
217 std::stringstream its_netmask_or_prefix;
218 auto its_unicast = configuration_->get_unicast_address();
219 if (its_unicast.is_v4())
220 its_netmask_or_prefix << "netmask:" << configuration_->get_netmask().to_string();
221 else
222 its_netmask_or_prefix << "prefix:" << configuration_->get_prefix();
223
224 VSOMEIP_INFO << "Client ["
225 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0')
226 << get_client()
227 << "] routes unicast:" << its_unicast.to_string()
228 << ", "
229 << its_netmask_or_prefix.str();
230
231 netlink_connector_ = std::make_shared<netlink_connector>(
232 host_->get_io(), configuration_->get_unicast_address(), its_multicast);
233 netlink_connector_->register_net_if_changes_handler(
234 std::bind(&routing_manager_impl::on_net_interface_or_route_state_changed,
235 this, std::placeholders::_1, std::placeholders::_2, std::placeholders::_3));
236 netlink_connector_->start();
237#else
238 {
239 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(pending_sd_offers_mutex_);
240 start_ip_routing();
241 }
242#endif
243
244 if (stub_)
245 stub_->start();
246 host_->on_state(state_type_e::ST_REGISTERED);
247
248 if (configuration_->log_version()) {
249 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(version_log_timer_mutex_);
250 version_log_timer_.expires_from_now(
251 std::chrono::seconds(0));
252 version_log_timer_.async_wait(std::bind(&routing_manager_impl::log_version_timer_cbk,
253 this, std::placeholders::_1));
254 }
255#if defined(__linux__) || defined(ANDROID) || defined(__QNX__)
256 if (configuration_->log_memory()) {
257 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(memory_log_timer_mutex_);
258 boost::system::error_code ec;
259 memory_log_timer_.expires_from_now(std::chrono::seconds(0), ec);
260 memory_log_timer_.async_wait(
261 std::bind(&routing_manager_impl::memory_log_timer_cbk, this,
262 std::placeholders::_1));
263 }
264#endif
265 if (configuration_->log_status()) {
266 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(status_log_timer_mutex_);
267 boost::system::error_code ec;
268 status_log_timer_.expires_from_now(std::chrono::seconds(0), ec);
269 status_log_timer_.async_wait(
270 std::bind(&routing_manager_impl::status_log_timer_cbk, this,
271 std::placeholders::_1));
272 }
273
274 if (configuration_->log_statistics()) {
275 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(statistics_log_timer_mutex_);
276 boost::system::error_code ec;
277 statistics_log_timer_.expires_from_now(std::chrono::seconds(0), ec);
278 statistics_log_timer_.async_wait(
279 std::bind(&routing_manager_impl::statistics_log_timer_cbk, this,
280 std::placeholders::_1));
281 }
282}
283
284void routing_manager_impl::stop() {
285 // Ensure to StopOffer all services that are offered by the application hosting the rm
286 local_services_map_t its_services;
287 {
288 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(local_services_mutex_);
289 for (const auto& s : local_services_) {
290 for (const auto& i : s.second) {
291 if (std::get<2>(i.second) == get_client()) {
292 its_services[s.first][i.first] = i.second;
293 }
294 }
295 }
296
297 }
298 for (const auto& s : its_services) {
299 for (const auto& i : s.second) {
300 on_stop_offer_service(std::get<2>(i.second), s.first, i.first,
301 std::get<0>(i.second), std::get<1>(i.second));
302 }
303 }
304
305 {
306 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(version_log_timer_mutex_);
307 version_log_timer_.cancel();
308 }
309#if defined(__linux__) || defined(ANDROID)
310 {
311 boost::system::error_code ec;
312 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(memory_log_timer_mutex_);
313 memory_log_timer_.cancel(ec);
314 }
315 if (netlink_connector_) {
316 netlink_connector_->stop();
317 }
318#endif
319
320 {
321 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(status_log_timer_mutex_);
322 boost::system::error_code ec;
323 status_log_timer_.cancel(ec);
324 }
325
326 {
327 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(statistics_log_timer_mutex_);
328 boost::system::error_code ec;
329 statistics_log_timer_.cancel(ec);
330 }
331
332 host_->on_state(state_type_e::ST_DEREGISTERED);
333
334 if (discovery_)
335 discovery_->stop();
336 if (stub_)
337 stub_->stop();
338
339 for (const auto client : ep_mgr_->get_connected_clients()) {
340 if (client != VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT) {
341 remove_local(client, true);
342 }
343 }
344}
345
346bool routing_manager_impl::insert_offer_command(service_t _service, instance_t _instance, uint8_t _command,
347 client_t _client, major_version_t _major, minor_version_t _minor) {
348 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(offer_serialization_mutex_);
349 // flag to indicate whether caller of this function can start directly processing the command
350 bool must_process(false);
351 auto found_service_instance = offer_commands_.find(std::make_pair(_service, _instance));
352 if (found_service_instance != offer_commands_.end()) {
353 // if nothing is queued
354 if (found_service_instance->second.empty()) {
355 must_process = true;
356 }
357 found_service_instance->second.push_back(
358 std::make_tuple(_command, _client, _major, _minor));
359 } else {
360 // nothing is queued -> add command to queue and process command directly
361 offer_commands_[std::make_pair(_service, _instance)].push_back(
362 std::make_tuple(_command, _client, _major, _minor));
363 must_process = true;
364 }
365 return must_process;
366}
367
368bool routing_manager_impl::erase_offer_command(service_t _service, instance_t _instance) {
369 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(offer_serialization_mutex_);
370 auto found_service_instance = offer_commands_.find(std::make_pair(_service, _instance));
371 if (found_service_instance != offer_commands_.end()) {
372 // erase processed command
373 if (!found_service_instance->second.empty()) {
374 found_service_instance->second.pop_front();
375 if (!found_service_instance->second.empty()) {
376 // check for other commands to be processed
377 auto its_command = found_service_instance->second.front();
378 if (std::get<0>(its_command) == uint8_t(protocol::id_e::OFFER_SERVICE_ID)) {
379 io_.post([&, its_command, _service, _instance](){
380 offer_service(std::get<1>(its_command), _service, _instance,
381 std::get<2>(its_command), std::get<3>(its_command), false);
382 });
383 } else {
384 io_.post([&, its_command, _service, _instance](){
385 stop_offer_service(std::get<1>(its_command), _service, _instance,
386 std::get<2>(its_command), std::get<3>(its_command), false);
387 });
388 }
389 }
390 }
391 }
392 return true;
393}
394
395bool routing_manager_impl::offer_service(client_t _client,
396 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
397 major_version_t _major, minor_version_t _minor) {
398
399 return offer_service(_client, _service, _instance, _major, _minor, true);
400}
401
402bool routing_manager_impl::offer_service(client_t _client,
403 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
404 major_version_t _major, minor_version_t _minor,
405 bool _must_queue) {
406
407 // only queue commands if method was NOT called via erase_offer_command()
408 if (_must_queue) {
409 if (!insert_offer_command(_service, _instance,
410 uint8_t(protocol::id_e::OFFER_SERVICE_ID),
411 _client, _major, _minor)) {
412 VSOMEIP_INFO << "rmi::" << __func__ << " ("
413 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _client <<"): ["
414 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _service << "."
415 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _instance
416 << ":" << std::dec << int(_major) << "." << std::dec << _minor << "]"
417 << " (" << std::boolalpha << _must_queue << ")"
418 << " not offering service, because insert_offer_command returned false!";
419 return false;
420 }
421 }
422
423 // Check if the application hosted by routing manager is allowed to offer
424 // offer_service requests of local proxies are checked in rms::on:message
425 if (_client == get_client()) {
426 if (VSOMEIP_SEC_OK != security::is_client_allowed_to_offer(
427 get_sec_client(), _service, _instance)) {
428 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "routing_manager_impl::offer_service: "
429 << std::hex << "Security: Client 0x" << _client
430 << " isn't allowed to offer the following service/instance "
431 << _service << "/" << _instance
432 << " ~> Skip offer!";
433 erase_offer_command(_service, _instance);
434 return false;
435 }
436 }
437
438 if (!handle_local_offer_service(_client, _service, _instance, _major, _minor)) {
439 erase_offer_command(_service, _instance);
440 VSOMEIP_INFO << __func__ << " ("
441 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _client <<"): ["
442 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _service << "."
443 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _instance
444 << ":" << std::dec << int(_major) << "." << std::dec << _minor << "]"
445 << " (" << std::boolalpha << _must_queue << ")"
446 << " not offering, returned from handle_local_offer_service!";
447 return false;
448 }
449
450 {
451 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(pending_sd_offers_mutex_);
452 if (if_state_running_) {
453 init_service_info(_service, _instance, true);
454 } else {
455 pending_sd_offers_.push_back(std::make_pair(_service, _instance));
456 }
457 }
458
459 if (discovery_) {
460 std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> its_info = find_service(_service, _instance);
461 if (its_info) {
462 discovery_->offer_service(its_info);
463 }
464 }
465
466 {
467 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> ist_lock(pending_subscription_mutex_);
468 std::set<event_t> its_already_subscribed_events;
469 for (auto &ps : pending_subscriptions_) {
470 if (ps.service_ == _service
471 && ps.instance_ == _instance
472 && ps.major_ == _major) {
473 insert_subscription(ps.service_, ps.instance_,
474 ps.eventgroup_, ps.event_, nullptr,
475 get_client(), &its_already_subscribed_events);
476#if 0
477 VSOMEIP_ERROR << __func__
478 << ": event="
479 << std::hex << ps.service_ << "."
480 << std::hex << ps.instance_ << "."
481 << std::hex << ps.event_;
482#endif
483 }
484 }
485
486 send_pending_subscriptions(_service, _instance, _major);
487 }
488 if (stub_)
489 stub_->on_offer_service(_client, _service, _instance, _major, _minor);
490 on_availability(_service, _instance, availability_state_e::AS_AVAILABLE, _major, _minor);
491 erase_offer_command(_service, _instance);
492
493 VSOMEIP_INFO << "OFFER("
494 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _client <<"): ["
495 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _service << "."
496 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _instance
497 << ":" << std::dec << int(_major) << "." << std::dec << _minor << "]"
498 << " (" << std::boolalpha << _must_queue << ")";
499
500 return true;
501}
502
503void routing_manager_impl::stop_offer_service(client_t _client,
504 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
505 major_version_t _major, minor_version_t _minor) {
506
507 stop_offer_service(_client, _service, _instance, _major, _minor, true);
508}
509
510void routing_manager_impl::stop_offer_service(client_t _client,
511 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
512 major_version_t _major, minor_version_t _minor,
513 bool _must_queue) {
514
515 VSOMEIP_INFO << "STOP OFFER("
516 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
517 << std::setw(4) << _client << "): ["
518 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
519 << std::setw(4) << _instance
520 << ":" << std::dec << int(_major) << "." << _minor << "]"
521 << " (" << std::boolalpha << _must_queue << ")";
522
523 if (_must_queue) {
524 if (!insert_offer_command(_service, _instance,
525 uint8_t(protocol::id_e::STOP_OFFER_SERVICE_ID),
526 _client, _major, _minor)) {
527 VSOMEIP_INFO << "rmi::" << __func__ << " ("
528 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _client <<"): ["
529 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _service << "."
530 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _instance
531 << ":" << std::dec << int(_major) << "." << _minor << "]"
532 << " (" << std::boolalpha << _must_queue << ")"
533 << " STOP-OFFER NOT INSERTED!";
534 return;
535 }
536 }
537
538 bool is_local(false);
539 {
540 std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> its_info = find_service(_service, _instance);
541 is_local = (its_info && its_info->is_local());
542 }
543 if (is_local) {
544 {
545 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(pending_sd_offers_mutex_);
546 for (auto it = pending_sd_offers_.begin(); it != pending_sd_offers_.end(); ) {
547 if (it->first == _service && it->second == _instance) {
548 it = pending_sd_offers_.erase(it);
549 break;
550 } else {
551 ++it;
552 }
553 }
554 }
555
556 on_stop_offer_service(_client, _service, _instance, _major, _minor);
557 if (stub_)
558 stub_->on_stop_offer_service(_client, _service, _instance, _major, _minor);
559 on_availability(_service, _instance, availability_state_e::AS_UNAVAILABLE, _major, _minor);
560 } else {
561 VSOMEIP_WARNING << __func__ << " received STOP_OFFER("
562 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
563 << std::setw(4) << _client << "): ["
564 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
565 << std::setw(4) << _instance
566 << ":" << std::dec << int(_major) << "." << _minor << "] "
567 << "for remote service --> ignore";
568 erase_offer_command(_service, _instance);
569 }
570}
571
572void routing_manager_impl::request_service(client_t _client, service_t _service,
573 instance_t _instance, major_version_t _major, minor_version_t _minor) {
574
575 VSOMEIP_INFO << "REQUEST("
576 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
577 << std::setw(4) << _client << "): ["
578 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
579 << std::setw(4) << _instance << ":"
580 << std::dec << int(_major) << "." << _minor << "]";
581
582 routing_manager_base::request_service(_client,
583 _service, _instance, _major, _minor);
584
585 auto its_info = find_service(_service, _instance);
586 if (!its_info) {
587 add_requested_service(_client, _service, _instance, _major, _minor);
588 if (discovery_) {
589 if (!configuration_->is_local_service(_service, _instance)) {
590 // Non local service instance ~> tell SD to find it!
591 discovery_->request_service(_service, _instance, _major, _minor,
592 DEFAULT_TTL);
593 } else {
594 VSOMEIP_INFO << std::hex
595 << "Avoid trigger SD find-service message"
596 << " for local service/instance/major/minor: "
597 << _service << "/" << _instance << std::dec
598 << "/" << (uint32_t)_major << "/" << _minor;
599 }
600 }
601 } else {
602 if ((_major == its_info->get_major()
603 || DEFAULT_MAJOR == its_info->get_major()
604 || ANY_MAJOR == _major)
605 && (_minor <= its_info->get_minor()
606 || DEFAULT_MINOR == its_info->get_minor()
607 || _minor == ANY_MINOR)) {
608 if(!its_info->is_local()) {
609 add_requested_service(_client, _service, _instance, _major, _minor);
610 if (discovery_) {
611 // Non local service instance ~> tell SD to find it!
612 discovery_->request_service(_service, _instance, _major,
613 _minor, DEFAULT_TTL);
614 }
615 its_info->add_client(_client);
616 ep_mgr_impl_->find_or_create_remote_client(_service, _instance);
617 }
618 }
619 }
620
621 if (_client == get_client()) {
622 if (stub_)
623 stub_->create_local_receiver();
624
625 protocol::service its_request(_service, _instance, _major, _minor);
626 std::set<protocol::service> requests;
627 requests.insert(its_request);
628
629 if (stub_)
630 stub_->handle_requests(_client, requests);
631 }
632}
633
634void routing_manager_impl::release_service(client_t _client, service_t _service,
635 instance_t _instance) {
636
637 VSOMEIP_INFO << "RELEASE("
638 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
639 << std::setw(4) << _client << "): ["
640 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
641 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "]";
642
643 if (host_->get_client() == _client) {
644 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(pending_subscription_mutex_);
645 remove_pending_subscription(_service, _instance, 0xFFFF, ANY_EVENT);
646 }
647 routing_manager_base::release_service(_client, _service, _instance);
648 remove_requested_service(_client, _service, _instance, ANY_MAJOR, ANY_MINOR);
649
650 std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> its_info(find_service(_service, _instance));
651 if (its_info && !its_info->is_local()) {
652 if (!its_info->get_requesters_size()) {
653 if (discovery_) {
654 discovery_->release_service(_service, _instance);
655 discovery_->unsubscribe_all(_service, _instance);
656 }
657 ep_mgr_impl_->clear_client_endpoints(_service, _instance, true);
658 ep_mgr_impl_->clear_client_endpoints(_service, _instance, false);
659 its_info->set_endpoint(nullptr, true);
660 its_info->set_endpoint(nullptr, false);
661 unset_all_eventpayloads(_service, _instance);
662 } else {
663 auto its_eventgroups = find_eventgroups(_service, _instance);
664 for (const auto &eg : its_eventgroups) {
665 auto its_id = eg->get_eventgroup();
666 auto its_events = eg->get_events();
667 bool eg_has_subscribers{false};
668 for (const auto &e : its_events) {
669 e->remove_subscriber(its_id, _client);
670 if (!e->get_subscribers().empty()) {
671 eg_has_subscribers = true;
672 }
673 }
674 discovery_->unsubscribe(_service, _instance, its_id, _client);
675 if (!eg_has_subscribers) {
676 for (const auto &e : its_events) {
677 e->unset_payload(true);
678 }
679 }
680 }
681 }
682 } else {
683 if (discovery_) {
684 discovery_->release_service(_service, _instance);
685 }
686 }
687}
688
689void routing_manager_impl::subscribe(
690 client_t _client, const vsomeip_sec_client_t *_sec_client,
691 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
692 eventgroup_t _eventgroup, major_version_t _major,
693 event_t _event, const std::shared_ptr<debounce_filter_impl_t> &_filter) {
694
695 VSOMEIP_INFO << "SUBSCRIBE("
696 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
697 << std::setw(4) << _client << "): ["
698 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
699 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
700 << std::setw(4) << _eventgroup << ":"
701 << std::setw(4) << _event << ":"
702 << std::dec << (uint16_t)_major << "]";
703 const client_t its_local_client = find_local_client(_service, _instance);
704 if (get_client() == its_local_client) {
705#ifdef VSOMEIP_ENABLE_COMPAT
706 routing_manager_base::set_incoming_subscription_state(_client, _service, _instance,
707 _eventgroup, _event, subscription_state_e::IS_SUBSCRIBING);
708#endif
709 auto self = shared_from_this();
710 host_->on_subscription(_service, _instance, _eventgroup, _client,
711 _sec_client, get_env(_client), true,
712 [this, self, _client, _sec_client, _service, _instance, _eventgroup,
713 _major, _event, _filter]
714 (const bool _subscription_accepted) {
715 (void) ep_mgr_->find_or_create_local(_client);
716 if (!_subscription_accepted) {
717 if (stub_)
718 stub_->send_subscribe_nack(_client, _service, _instance, _eventgroup, _event);
719 VSOMEIP_INFO << "Subscription request from client: 0x" << std::hex
720 << _client << std::dec << " for eventgroup: 0x" << _eventgroup
721 << " rejected from application handler.";
722 return;
723 } else if (stub_) {
724 stub_->send_subscribe_ack(_client, _service, _instance, _eventgroup, _event);
725 }
726 routing_manager_base::subscribe(_client, _sec_client,
727 _service, _instance, _eventgroup, _major,
728 _event, _filter);
729#ifdef VSOMEIP_ENABLE_COMPAT
730 send_pending_notify_ones(_service, _instance, _eventgroup, _client);
731 routing_manager_base::erase_incoming_subscription_state(_client, _service, _instance,
732 _eventgroup, _event);
733#endif
734 });
735 } else {
736 if (discovery_) {
737 std::set<event_t> its_already_subscribed_events;
738
739 // Note: The calls to insert_subscription & handle_subscription_state must not
740 // run concurrently to a call to on_subscribe_ack. Therefore the lock is acquired
741 // before calling insert_subscription and released after the call to
742 // handle_subscription_state.
743 std::unique_lock<std::mutex> its_critical(remote_subscription_state_mutex_);
744 bool inserted = insert_subscription(_service, _instance, _eventgroup,
745 _event, _filter, _client, &its_already_subscribed_events);
746 const bool subscriber_is_rm_host = (get_client() == _client);
747 if (inserted) {
748 if (0 == its_local_client) {
749 handle_subscription_state(_client, _service, _instance, _eventgroup, _event);
750 its_critical.unlock();
751 static const ttl_t configured_ttl(configuration_->get_sd_ttl());
752 notify_one_current_value(_client, _service, _instance,
753 _eventgroup, _event, its_already_subscribed_events);
754
755 auto its_info = find_eventgroup(_service, _instance, _eventgroup);
756 // if the subscriber is the rm_host itself: check if service
757 // is available before subscribing via SD otherwise we sent
758 // a StopSubscribe/Subscribe once the first offer is received
759 if (its_info &&
760 (!subscriber_is_rm_host || find_service(_service, _instance))) {
761 discovery_->subscribe(_service, _instance, _eventgroup,
762 _major, configured_ttl,
763 its_info->is_selective() ? _client : VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT,
764 its_info);
765 }
766 } else {
767 its_critical.unlock();
768 if (is_available(_service, _instance, _major) && stub_) {
769 stub_->send_subscribe(ep_mgr_->find_local(_service, _instance),
770 _client, _service, _instance, _eventgroup, _major,
771 _event, _filter, PENDING_SUBSCRIPTION_ID);
772 }
773 }
774 }
775 if (subscriber_is_rm_host) {
776 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> ist_lock(pending_subscription_mutex_);
777 subscription_data_t subscription = {
778 _service, _instance,
779 _eventgroup, _major,
780 _event, _filter,
781 *_sec_client
782 };
783 pending_subscriptions_.insert(subscription);
784 }
785 } else {
786 VSOMEIP_ERROR<< "SOME/IP eventgroups require SD to be enabled!";
787 }
788 }
789}
790
791void routing_manager_impl::unsubscribe(
792 client_t _client, const vsomeip_sec_client_t *_sec_client,
793 service_t _service, instance_t _instance, eventgroup_t _eventgroup,
794 event_t _event) {
795
796 VSOMEIP_INFO << "UNSUBSCRIBE("
797 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
798 << std::setw(4) << _client << "): ["
799 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
800 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
801 << std::setw(4) << _eventgroup << "."
802 << std::setw(4) << _event << "]";
803
804 bool last_subscriber_removed(true);
805
806 std::shared_ptr<eventgroupinfo> its_info
807 = find_eventgroup(_service, _instance, _eventgroup);
808 if (its_info) {
809 for (const auto& e : its_info->get_events()) {
810 if (e->get_event() == _event || ANY_EVENT == _event)
811 e->remove_subscriber(_eventgroup, _client);
812 }
813 for (const auto& e : its_info->get_events()) {
814 if (e->has_subscriber(_eventgroup, ANY_CLIENT)) {
815 last_subscriber_removed = false;
816 break;
817 }
818 }
819 }
820
821 if (discovery_) {
822 host_->on_subscription(_service, _instance, _eventgroup, _client,
823 _sec_client, get_env(_client), false,
824 [](const bool _subscription_accepted){ (void)_subscription_accepted; });
825 if (0 == find_local_client(_service, _instance)) {
826 if (get_client() == _client) {
827 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> ist_lock(pending_subscription_mutex_);
828 remove_pending_subscription(_service, _instance, _eventgroup, _event);
829 }
830 if (last_subscriber_removed) {
831 unset_all_eventpayloads(_service, _instance, _eventgroup);
832 {
833 auto tuple = std::make_tuple(_service, _instance, _eventgroup, _client);
834 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(remote_subscription_state_mutex_);
835 remote_subscription_state_.erase(tuple);
836 }
837 }
838
839 if (its_info &&
840 (last_subscriber_removed || its_info->is_selective())) {
841
842 discovery_->unsubscribe(_service, _instance, _eventgroup,
843 its_info->is_selective() ? _client : VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT);
844 }
845 } else {
846 if (get_client() == _client) {
847 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> ist_lock(pending_subscription_mutex_);
848 remove_pending_subscription(_service, _instance, _eventgroup, _event);
849 if (stub_)
850 stub_->send_unsubscribe(
851 ep_mgr_->find_local(_service, _instance),
852 _client, _service, _instance, _eventgroup, _event,
853 PENDING_SUBSCRIPTION_ID);
854 }
855 }
856 ep_mgr_impl_->clear_multicast_endpoints(_service, _instance);
857
858 } else {
859 VSOMEIP_ERROR<< "SOME/IP eventgroups require SD to be enabled!";
860 }
861}
862
863bool routing_manager_impl::send(client_t _client,
864 std::shared_ptr<message> _message, bool _force) {
865
866 return routing_manager_base::send(_client, _message, _force);
867}
868
869bool routing_manager_impl::send(client_t _client, const byte_t *_data,
870 length_t _size, instance_t _instance, bool _reliable,
871 client_t _bound_client, const vsomeip_sec_client_t *_sec_client,
872 uint8_t _status_check, bool _sent_from_remote, bool _force) {
873
874 bool is_sent(false);
875 if (_size > VSOMEIP_MESSAGE_TYPE_POS) {
876 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> its_target;
877 bool is_request = utility::is_request(_data[VSOMEIP_MESSAGE_TYPE_POS]);
878 bool is_notification = utility::is_notification(_data[VSOMEIP_MESSAGE_TYPE_POS]);
879 bool is_response = utility::is_response(_data[VSOMEIP_MESSAGE_TYPE_POS]);
880
881 client_t its_client = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(_data[VSOMEIP_CLIENT_POS_MIN],
882 _data[VSOMEIP_CLIENT_POS_MAX]);
883 service_t its_service = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
884 _data[VSOMEIP_SERVICE_POS_MIN], _data[VSOMEIP_SERVICE_POS_MAX]);
885 method_t its_method = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
886 _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MIN], _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MAX]);
887
888 bool is_service_discovery
889 = (its_service == sd::service && its_method == sd::method);
890
891 if (is_request) {
892 its_target = ep_mgr_->find_local(its_service, _instance);
893 } else if (!is_notification) {
894 its_target = find_local(its_client);
895 } else if (is_notification && _client && !is_service_discovery) { // Selective notifications!
896 if (_client == get_client()) {
897#ifdef USE_DLT
898 trace::header its_header;
899 if (its_header.prepare(its_target, true, _instance))
900 tc_->trace(its_header.data_, VSOMEIP_TRACE_HEADER_SIZE,
901 _data, _size);
902#endif
903 deliver_message(_data, _size, _instance, _reliable,
904 _bound_client, _sec_client,
905 _status_check, _sent_from_remote);
906 return true;
907 }
908 its_target = find_local(_client);
909 }
910
911 if (its_target) {
912#ifdef USE_DLT
913 if ((is_request && its_client == get_client()) ||
914 (is_response && find_local_client(its_service, _instance) == get_client()) ||
915 (is_notification && find_local_client(its_service, _instance) == VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT)) {
916
917 trace::header its_header;
918 if (its_header.prepare(its_target, true, _instance))
919 tc_->trace(its_header.data_, VSOMEIP_TRACE_HEADER_SIZE,
920 _data, _size);
921 }
922#endif
923 is_sent = send_local(its_target, get_client(), _data, _size, _instance,
924 _reliable, protocol::id_e::SEND_ID, _status_check);
925 } else {
926 // Check whether hosting application should get the message
927 // If not, check routes to external
928 if ((its_client == host_->get_client() && is_response)
929 || (find_local_client(its_service, _instance)
930 == host_->get_client() && is_request)) {
931 // TODO: Find out how to handle session id here
932 is_sent = deliver_message(_data, _size, _instance, _reliable,
933 VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT, _sec_client, _status_check);
934 } else {
935 e2e_buffer its_buffer;
936
937 if (e2e_provider_) {
938 if ( !is_service_discovery) {
939 service_t its_service = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
940 _data[VSOMEIP_SERVICE_POS_MIN], _data[VSOMEIP_SERVICE_POS_MAX]);
941 method_t its_method = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
942 _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MIN], _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MAX]);
943#ifndef ANDROID
944 if (e2e_provider_->is_protected({its_service, its_method})) {
945 // Find out where the protected area starts
946 size_t its_base = e2e_provider_->get_protection_base({its_service, its_method});
947
948 // Build a corresponding buffer
949 its_buffer.assign(_data + its_base, _data + _size);
950
951 e2e_provider_->protect({ its_service, its_method }, its_buffer, _instance);
952
953 // Prepend header
954 its_buffer.insert(its_buffer.begin(), _data, _data + its_base);
955
956 _data = its_buffer.data();
957 }
958#endif
959 }
960 }
961 if (is_request) {
962 its_target = ep_mgr_impl_->find_or_create_remote_client(
963 its_service, _instance, _reliable);
964 if (its_target) {
965#ifdef USE_DLT
966 trace::header its_header;
967 if (its_header.prepare(its_target, true, _instance))
968 tc_->trace(its_header.data_, VSOMEIP_TRACE_HEADER_SIZE,
969 _data, _size);
970#endif
971 is_sent = its_target->send(_data, _size);
972 } else {
973 const session_t its_session = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
974 _data[VSOMEIP_SESSION_POS_MIN],
975 _data[VSOMEIP_SESSION_POS_MAX]);
976 VSOMEIP_ERROR<< "Routing info for remote service could not be found! ("
977 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
978 << std::setw(4) << its_client << "): ["
979 << std::setw(4) << its_service << "."
980 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
981 << std::setw(4) << its_method << "] "
982 << std::setw(4) << its_session;
983 }
984 } else {
985 std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> its_info(find_service(its_service, _instance));
986 if (its_info || is_service_discovery) {
987 if (is_notification && !is_service_discovery) {
988 (void)send_local_notification(get_client(), _data, _size, _instance,
989 _reliable, _status_check, _force);
990 method_t its_method = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(_data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MIN],
991 _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MAX]);
992 std::shared_ptr<event> its_event = find_event(its_service, _instance, its_method);
993 if (its_event) {
994#ifdef USE_DLT
995 bool has_sent(false);
996#endif
997 std::set<std::shared_ptr<endpoint_definition>> its_targets;
998 // we need both endpoints as clients can subscribe to events via TCP and UDP
999 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> its_udp_server_endpoint = its_info->get_endpoint(false);
1000 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> its_tcp_server_endpoint = its_info->get_endpoint(true);
1001
1002 if (its_udp_server_endpoint || its_tcp_server_endpoint) {
1003 const auto its_reliability = its_event->get_reliability();
1004 for (auto its_group : its_event->get_eventgroups()) {
1005 auto its_eventgroup = find_eventgroup(its_service, _instance, its_group);
1006 if (its_eventgroup) {
1007 // Unicast targets
1008 for (const auto &its_remote : its_eventgroup->get_unicast_targets()) {
1009 if (its_remote->is_reliable() && its_tcp_server_endpoint) {
1010 if (its_reliability == reliability_type_e::RT_RELIABLE
1011 || its_reliability == reliability_type_e::RT_BOTH) {
1012 its_targets.insert(its_remote);
1013 }
1014 } else if (its_udp_server_endpoint && !its_eventgroup->is_sending_multicast()) {
1015 if (its_reliability == reliability_type_e::RT_UNRELIABLE
1016 || its_reliability == reliability_type_e::RT_BOTH) {
1017 its_targets.insert(its_remote);
1018 }
1019 }
1020 }
1021 // Send to multicast targets if subscribers are still interested
1022 if (its_eventgroup->is_sending_multicast()) {
1023 if (its_reliability == reliability_type_e::RT_UNRELIABLE
1024 || its_reliability == reliability_type_e::RT_BOTH) {
1025 boost::asio::ip::address its_address;
1026 uint16_t its_port;
1027 if (its_eventgroup->get_multicast(its_address, its_port)) {
1028 std::shared_ptr<endpoint_definition> its_multicast_target;
1029 its_multicast_target = endpoint_definition::get(its_address,
1030 its_port, false, its_service, _instance);
1031 its_targets.insert(its_multicast_target);
1032 }
1033 }
1034 }
1035 }
1036 }
1037 }
1038
1039 for (auto const &target : its_targets) {
1040 if (target->is_reliable()) {
1041 its_tcp_server_endpoint->send_to(target, _data, _size);
1042 } else {
1043 its_udp_server_endpoint->send_to(target, _data, _size);
1044 }
1045#ifdef USE_DLT
1046 has_sent = true;
1047#endif
1048 }
1049#ifdef USE_DLT
1050 if (has_sent) {
1051 trace::header its_header;
1052 if (its_header.prepare(nullptr, true, _instance))
1053 tc_->trace(its_header.data_, VSOMEIP_TRACE_HEADER_SIZE,
1054 _data, _size);
1055 }
1056#endif
1057 }
1058 } else {
1059 if ((utility::is_response(_data[VSOMEIP_MESSAGE_TYPE_POS])
1060 || utility::is_error(_data[VSOMEIP_MESSAGE_TYPE_POS]))
1061 && !its_info->is_local()) {
1062 // We received a response/error but neither the hosting application
1063 // nor another local client could be found --> drop
1064 const session_t its_session = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
1065 _data[VSOMEIP_SESSION_POS_MIN],
1066 _data[VSOMEIP_SESSION_POS_MAX]);
1067 VSOMEIP_ERROR
1068 << "routing_manager_impl::send: Received response/error for unknown client ("
1069 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
1070 << std::setw(4) << its_client << "): ["
1071 << std::setw(4) << its_service << "."
1072 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
1073 << std::setw(4) << its_method << "] "
1074 << std::setw(4) << its_session;
1075 return false;
1076 }
1077 its_target = is_service_discovery ?
1078 (sd_info_ ? sd_info_->get_endpoint(false) : nullptr) : its_info->get_endpoint(_reliable);
1079 if (its_target) {
1080#ifdef USE_DLT
1081 trace::header its_header;
1082 if (its_header.prepare(its_target, true, _instance))
1083 tc_->trace(its_header.data_, VSOMEIP_TRACE_HEADER_SIZE,
1084 _data, _size);
1085#endif
1086 is_sent = its_target->send(_data, _size);
1087 } else {
1088 const session_t its_session = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
1089 _data[VSOMEIP_SESSION_POS_MIN],
1090 _data[VSOMEIP_SESSION_POS_MAX]);
1091 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "Routing error. Endpoint for service ("
1092 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
1093 << std::setw(4) << its_client << "): ["
1094 << std::setw(4) << its_service << "."
1095 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
1096 << std::setw(4) << its_method << "] "
1097 << std::setw(4) << its_session
1098 << " could not be found!";
1099 }
1100 }
1101 } else {
1102 if (!is_notification) {
1103 const session_t its_session = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
1104 _data[VSOMEIP_SESSION_POS_MIN],
1105 _data[VSOMEIP_SESSION_POS_MAX]);
1106 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "Routing error. Not hosting service ("
1107 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
1108 << std::setw(4) << its_client << "): ["
1109 << std::setw(4) << its_service << "."
1110 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
1111 << std::setw(4) << its_method << "] "
1112 << std::setw(4) << its_session;
1113 }
1114 }
1115 }
1116 }
1117 }
1118 }
1119
1120 return is_sent;
1121}
1122
1123bool routing_manager_impl::send_to(
1124 const client_t _client,
1125 const std::shared_ptr<endpoint_definition> &_target,
1126 std::shared_ptr<message> _message) {
1127
1128 bool is_sent(false);
1129
1130 std::shared_ptr<serializer> its_serializer(get_serializer());
1131 if (its_serializer->serialize(_message.get())) {
1132 const byte_t *its_data = its_serializer->get_data();
1133 length_t its_size = its_serializer->get_size();
1134 e2e_buffer its_buffer;
1135 if (e2e_provider_) {
1136 service_t its_service = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
1137 its_data[VSOMEIP_SERVICE_POS_MIN],
1138 its_data[VSOMEIP_SERVICE_POS_MAX]);
1139 method_t its_method = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
1140 its_data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MIN],
1141 its_data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MAX]);
1142#ifndef ANDROID
1143 if (e2e_provider_->is_protected({its_service, its_method})) {
1144 auto its_base = e2e_provider_->get_protection_base({its_service, its_method});
1145 its_buffer.assign(its_data + its_base, its_data + its_size);
1146 e2e_provider_->protect({its_service, its_method}, its_buffer, _message->get_instance());
1147 its_buffer.insert(its_buffer.begin(), its_data, its_data + its_base);
1148 its_data = its_buffer.data();
1149 }
1150#endif
1151 }
1152
1153 const_cast<byte_t*>(its_data)[VSOMEIP_CLIENT_POS_MIN] = VSOMEIP_WORD_BYTE1(_client);
1154 const_cast<byte_t*>(its_data)[VSOMEIP_CLIENT_POS_MAX] = VSOMEIP_WORD_BYTE0(_client);
1155
1156 is_sent = send_to(_target, its_data, its_size, _message->get_instance());
1157
1158 its_serializer->reset();
1159 put_serializer(its_serializer);
1160 } else {
1161 VSOMEIP_ERROR<< "routing_manager_impl::send_to: serialization failed.";
1162 }
1163 return is_sent;
1164}
1165
1166bool routing_manager_impl::send_to(
1167 const std::shared_ptr<endpoint_definition> &_target,
1168 const byte_t *_data, uint32_t _size, instance_t _instance) {
1169
1170 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> its_endpoint =
1171 ep_mgr_impl_->find_server_endpoint(
1172 _target->get_remote_port(), _target->is_reliable());
1173
1174 if (its_endpoint) {
1175#ifdef USE_DLT
1176 trace::header its_header;
1177 if (its_header.prepare(its_endpoint, true, _instance))
1178 tc_->trace(its_header.data_, VSOMEIP_TRACE_HEADER_SIZE,
1179 _data, _size);
1180#else
1181 (void) _instance;
1182#endif
1183 return its_endpoint->send_to(_target, _data, _size);
1184 }
1185 return false;
1186}
1187
1188bool routing_manager_impl::send_via_sd(
1189 const std::shared_ptr<endpoint_definition> &_target,
1190 const byte_t *_data, uint32_t _size, uint16_t _sd_port) {
1191 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> its_endpoint =
1192 ep_mgr_impl_->find_server_endpoint(_sd_port,
1193 _target->is_reliable());
1194
1195 if (its_endpoint) {
1196#ifdef USE_DLT
1197 if (tc_->is_sd_enabled()) {
1198 trace::header its_header;
1199 if (its_header.prepare(its_endpoint, true, 0x0))
1200 tc_->trace(its_header.data_, VSOMEIP_TRACE_HEADER_SIZE,
1201 _data, _size);
1202
1203 }
1204#endif
1205 return its_endpoint->send_to(_target, _data, _size);
1206 }
1207
1208 return false;
1209}
1210
1211void routing_manager_impl::register_event(client_t _client,
1212 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
1213 event_t _notifier,
1214 const std::set<eventgroup_t> &_eventgroups, const event_type_e _type,
1215 reliability_type_e _reliability,
1216 std::chrono::milliseconds _cycle, bool _change_resets_cycle,
1217 bool _update_on_change,
1218 epsilon_change_func_t _epsilon_change_func,
1219 bool _is_provided, bool _is_shadow, bool _is_cache_placeholder) {
1220 auto its_event = find_event(_service, _instance, _notifier);
1221 bool is_first(false);
1222 if (its_event) {
1223 if (!its_event->has_ref(_client, _is_provided)) {
1224 is_first = true;
1225 }
1226 } else {
1227 is_first = true;
1228 }
1229 if (is_first) {
1230 routing_manager_base::register_event(_client,
1231 _service, _instance,
1232 _notifier,
1233 _eventgroups, _type, _reliability,
1234 _cycle, _change_resets_cycle, _update_on_change,
1235 _epsilon_change_func, _is_provided, _is_shadow,
1236 _is_cache_placeholder);
1237 }
1238 VSOMEIP_INFO << "REGISTER EVENT("
1239 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
1240 << std::setw(4) << _client << "): ["
1241 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
1242 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
1243 << std::setw(4) << _notifier
1244 << ":is_provider=" << std::boolalpha << _is_provided << "]";
1245}
1246
1247void routing_manager_impl::register_shadow_event(client_t _client,
1248 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
1249 event_t _notifier,
1250 const std::set<eventgroup_t> &_eventgroups, event_type_e _type,
1251 reliability_type_e _reliability, bool _is_provided, bool _is_cyclic) {
1252
1253 routing_manager_base::register_event(_client,
1254 _service, _instance,
1255 _notifier,
1256 _eventgroups, _type, _reliability,
1257 (_is_cyclic ? std::chrono::milliseconds(1)
1258 : std::chrono::milliseconds::zero()),
1259 false, true, nullptr,
1260 _is_provided, true);
1261}
1262
1263void routing_manager_impl::unregister_shadow_event(client_t _client,
1264 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
1265 event_t _event, bool _is_provided) {
1266 routing_manager_base::unregister_event(_client, _service, _instance,
1267 _event, _is_provided);
1268}
1269
1270void routing_manager_impl::notify_one(service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
1271 event_t _event, std::shared_ptr<payload> _payload, client_t _client,
1272 bool _force
1273#ifdef VSOMEIP_ENABLE_COMPAT
1274 , bool _remote_subscriber
1275#endif
1276 ) {
1277 if (find_local(_client)) {
1278 routing_manager_base::notify_one(_service, _instance, _event, _payload,
1279 _client, _force
1280#ifdef VSOMEIP_ENABLE_COMPAT
1281 , _remote_subscriber
1282#endif
1283 );
1284 } else {
1285 std::shared_ptr<event> its_event = find_event(_service, _instance, _event);
1286 if (its_event) {
1287 std::set<std::shared_ptr<endpoint_definition> > its_targets;
1288 const auto its_reliability = its_event->get_reliability();
1289 for (const auto g : its_event->get_eventgroups()) {
1290 const auto its_eventgroup = find_eventgroup(_service, _instance, g);
1291 if (its_eventgroup) {
1292 const auto its_subscriptions = its_eventgroup->get_remote_subscriptions();
1293 for (const auto &s : its_subscriptions) {
1294 if (s->has_client(_client)) {
1295 if (its_reliability == reliability_type_e::RT_RELIABLE
1296 || its_reliability == reliability_type_e::RT_BOTH) {
1297 const auto its_reliable = s->get_reliable();
1298 if (its_reliable)
1299 its_targets.insert(its_reliable);
1300 }
1301 if (its_reliability == reliability_type_e::RT_UNRELIABLE
1302 || its_reliability == reliability_type_e::RT_BOTH) {
1303 const auto its_unreliable = s->get_unreliable();
1304 if (its_unreliable)
1305 its_targets.insert(its_unreliable);
1306 }
1307 }
1308 }
1309 }
1310 }
1311
1312 if (its_targets.size() > 0) {
1313 for (const auto &its_target : its_targets) {
1314 its_event->set_payload(_payload, _client, its_target, _force);
1315 }
1316 }
1317 } else {
1318 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "Attempt to update the undefined event/field ["
1319 << std::hex << _service << "." << _instance << "." << _event
1320 << "]";
1321 }
1322 }
1323}
1324
1325void routing_manager_impl::on_availability(service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
1326 availability_state_e _state, major_version_t _major, minor_version_t _minor) {
1327 // insert subscriptions of routing manager into service discovery
1328 // to send SubscribeEventgroup after StopOffer / Offer was received
1329 if (_state == availability_state_e::AS_AVAILABLE) {
1330 if (discovery_) {
1331 const client_t its_local_client = find_local_client(_service, _instance);
1332 // remote service
1333 if (VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT == its_local_client) {
1334 static const ttl_t configured_ttl(configuration_->get_sd_ttl());
1335 std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> its_subscribed_lock(discovery_->get_subscribed_mutex());
1336 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(pending_subscription_mutex_);
1337 for (auto &ps : pending_subscriptions_) {
1338 if (ps.service_ == _service
1339 && ps.instance_ == _instance
1340 && ps.major_ == _major) {
1341 auto its_info = find_eventgroup(_service, _instance, ps.eventgroup_);
1342 if (its_info) {
1343 discovery_->subscribe(
1344 _service,
1345 _instance,
1346 ps.eventgroup_,
1347 _major,
1348 configured_ttl,
1349 its_info->is_selective() ? get_client() : VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT,
1350 its_info);
1351 }
1352 }
1353 }
1354 }
1355 }
1356 }
1357 host_->on_availability(_service, _instance, _state, _major, _minor);
1358}
1359
1360
1361bool routing_manager_impl::offer_service_remotely(service_t _service,
1362 instance_t _instance,
1363 std::uint16_t _port,
1364 bool _reliable,
1365 bool _magic_cookies_enabled) {
1366 bool ret = true;
1367
1368 if(!is_available(_service, _instance, ANY_MAJOR)) {
1369 VSOMEIP_ERROR << __func__ << ": Service ["
1370 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
1371 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
1372 << std::setw(4) << _instance
1373 << "] is not offered locally! Won't offer it remotely.";
1374 ret = false;
1375 } else {
1376 // update service info in configuration
1377 if (!configuration_->remote_offer_info_add(_service, _instance, _port,
1378 _reliable, _magic_cookies_enabled)) {
1379 ret = false;
1380 } else {
1381 // trigger event registration again to create shadow events
1382 const client_t its_offering_client = find_local_client(_service, _instance);
1383 if (its_offering_client == VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT) {
1384 VSOMEIP_ERROR << __func__ << " didn't find offering client for service ["
1385 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
1386 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
1387 << std::setw(4) << _instance
1388 << "]";
1389 ret = false;
1390 } else {
1391 if (stub_ && !stub_->send_provided_event_resend_request(its_offering_client,
1392 pending_remote_offer_add(_service, _instance))) {
1393 VSOMEIP_ERROR << __func__ << ": Couldn't send event resend"
1394 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
1395 << "request to client 0x" << std::setw(4) << its_offering_client
1396 << " providing service [" << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
1397 << std::setw(4) << _instance
1398 << "]";
1399
1400 ret = false;
1401 }
1402 }
1403 }
1404 }
1405 return ret;
1406}
1407
1408bool routing_manager_impl::stop_offer_service_remotely(service_t _service,
1409 instance_t _instance,
1410 std::uint16_t _port,
1411 bool _reliable,
1412 bool _magic_cookies_enabled) {
1413 bool ret = true;
1414 bool service_still_offered_remote(false);
1415 // update service configuration
1416 if (!configuration_->remote_offer_info_remove(_service, _instance, _port,
1417 _reliable, _magic_cookies_enabled, &service_still_offered_remote)) {
1418 VSOMEIP_ERROR << __func__ << " couldn't remove remote offer info for service ["
1419 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
1420 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
1421 << std::setw(4) << _instance
1422 << "] from configuration";
1423 ret = false;
1424 }
1425 std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> its_info = find_service(_service, _instance);
1426 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> its_server_endpoint;
1427 if (its_info) {
1428 its_server_endpoint = its_info->get_endpoint(_reliable);
1429 }
1430 // don't deregister events if the service is still offered remotely
1431 if (!service_still_offered_remote) {
1432 const client_t its_offering_client = find_local_client(_service, _instance);
1433 major_version_t its_major(0);
1434 minor_version_t its_minor(0);
1435 if (its_info) {
1436 its_major = its_info->get_major();
1437 its_minor = its_info->get_minor();
1438 }
1439 // unset payload and clear subcribers
1440 routing_manager_base::stop_offer_service(its_offering_client,
1441 _service, _instance, its_major, its_minor);
1442 // unregister events
1443 for (const event_t its_event_id : find_events(_service, _instance)) {
1444 unregister_shadow_event(its_offering_client, _service, _instance,
1445 its_event_id, true);
1446 }
1447 clear_targets_and_pending_sub_from_eventgroups(_service, _instance);
1448 clear_remote_subscriber(_service, _instance);
1449
1450 if (discovery_ && its_info) {
1451 discovery_->stop_offer_service(its_info, true);
1452 its_info->set_endpoint(std::shared_ptr<endpoint>(), _reliable);
1453 }
1454 } else {
1455 // service is still partly offered
1456 if (discovery_ && its_info) {
1457 std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> its_copied_info =
1458 std::make_shared<serviceinfo>(*its_info);
1459 its_info->set_endpoint(std::shared_ptr<endpoint>(), _reliable);
1460 // ensure to not send StopOffer for endpoint on which the service is
1461 // still offered
1462 its_copied_info->set_endpoint(std::shared_ptr<endpoint>(), !_reliable);
1463 discovery_->stop_offer_service(its_copied_info, true);
1464 VSOMEIP_INFO << __func__ << " only sending the StopOffer to ["
1465 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _service << '.'
1466 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _instance << ']'
1467 << " with reliability (" << std::boolalpha << !_reliable << ')'
1468 << " as the service is still partly offered!";
1469 }
1470 }
1471
1472 cleanup_server_endpoint(_service, its_server_endpoint);
1473 return ret;
1474}
1475
1476void routing_manager_impl::on_message(const byte_t *_data, length_t _size,
1477 endpoint *_receiver, bool _is_multicast,
1478 client_t _bound_client, const vsomeip_sec_client_t *_sec_client,
1479 const boost::asio::ip::address &_remote_address,
1480 std::uint16_t _remote_port) {
1481#if 0
1482 std::stringstream msg;
1483 msg << "rmi::on_message: ";
1484 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < _size; ++i)
1485 msg << std::hex << std::setw(2) << std::setfill('0') << (int)_data[i] << " ";
1486 VSOMEIP_INFO << msg.str();
1487#endif
1488 (void)_bound_client;
1489 service_t its_service;
1490 method_t its_method;
1491 uint8_t its_check_status = e2e::profile_interface::generic_check_status::E2E_OK;
1492 instance_t its_instance(0x0);
1493 message_type_e its_message_type;
1494#ifdef USE_DLT
1495 bool is_forwarded(true);
1496#endif
1497 if (_size >= VSOMEIP_SOMEIP_HEADER_SIZE) {
1498 its_message_type = static_cast<message_type_e>(_data[VSOMEIP_MESSAGE_TYPE_POS]);
1499 its_service = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(_data[VSOMEIP_SERVICE_POS_MIN],
1500 _data[VSOMEIP_SERVICE_POS_MAX]);
1501 if (its_service == VSOMEIP_SD_SERVICE) {
1502 its_method = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(_data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MIN],
1503 _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MAX]);
1504 if (discovery_ && its_method == sd::method) {
1505 if (configuration_->get_sd_port() == _remote_port) {
1506 if (!_remote_address.is_unspecified()) {
1507 // ACL check SD message
1508 if(!is_acl_message_allowed(_receiver, its_service, ANY_INSTANCE, _remote_address)) {
1509 return;
1510 }
1511 discovery_->on_message(_data, _size, _remote_address, _is_multicast);
1512 } else {
1513 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "Ignored SD message from unknown address.";
1514 }
1515 } else {
1516 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "Ignored SD message from unknown port ("
1517 << _remote_port << ")";
1518 }
1519 }
1520 } else {
1521 if (_is_multicast) {
1522 its_instance = ep_mgr_impl_->find_instance_multicast(its_service, _remote_address);
1523 } else {
1524 its_instance = ep_mgr_impl_->find_instance(its_service, _receiver);
1525 }
1526 if (its_instance == 0xFFFF) {
1527 its_method = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
1528 _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MIN],
1529 _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MAX]);
1530 const client_t its_client = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
1531 _data[VSOMEIP_CLIENT_POS_MIN],
1532 _data[VSOMEIP_CLIENT_POS_MAX]);
1533 const session_t its_session = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
1534 _data[VSOMEIP_SESSION_POS_MIN],
1535 _data[VSOMEIP_SESSION_POS_MAX]);
1536 boost::system::error_code ec;
1537 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "Received message on invalid port: ["
1538 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
1539 << std::setw(4) << its_service << "."
1540 << std::setw(4) << its_instance << "."
1541 << std::setw(4) << its_method << "."
1542 << std::setw(4) << its_client << "."
1543 << std::setw(4) << its_session << "] from: "
1544 << _remote_address.to_string(ec) << ":" << std::dec << _remote_port;
1545 }
1546 //Ignore messages with invalid message type
1547 if(_size >= VSOMEIP_MESSAGE_TYPE_POS) {
1548 if(!utility::is_valid_message_type(its_message_type)) {
1549 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "Ignored SomeIP message with invalid message type.";
1550 return;
1551 }
1552 }
1553 return_code_e return_code = check_error(_data, _size, its_instance);
1554 if(!(_size >= VSOMEIP_MESSAGE_TYPE_POS && utility::is_request_no_return(_data[VSOMEIP_MESSAGE_TYPE_POS]))) {
1555 if (return_code != return_code_e::E_OK && return_code != return_code_e::E_NOT_OK) {
1556 send_error(return_code, _data, _size, its_instance,
1557 _receiver->is_reliable(), _receiver,
1558 _remote_address, _remote_port);
1559 return;
1560 }
1561 } else if(return_code != return_code_e::E_OK && return_code != return_code_e::E_NOT_OK) {
1562 //Ignore request no response message if an error occured
1563 return;
1564 }
1565
1566 // Security checks if enabled!
1567 if (configuration_->is_security_enabled()) {
1568 if (utility::is_request(_data[VSOMEIP_MESSAGE_TYPE_POS])) {
1569 client_t requester = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
1570 _data[VSOMEIP_CLIENT_POS_MIN],
1571 _data[VSOMEIP_CLIENT_POS_MAX]);
1572 its_method = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
1573 _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MIN],
1574 _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MAX]);
1575 if (!configuration_->is_offered_remote(its_service, its_instance)) {
1576 VSOMEIP_WARNING << std::hex << "Security: Received a remote request "
1577 << "for service/instance " << its_service << "/" << its_instance
1578 << " which isn't offered remote ~> Skip message!";
1579 return;
1580 }
1581 if (find_local(requester)) {
1582 VSOMEIP_WARNING << std::hex << "Security: Received a remote request "
1583 << "from client identifier 0x" << requester
1584 << " which is already used locally ~> Skip message!";
1585 return;
1586 }
1587 if (!configuration_->is_remote_access_allowed()) {
1588 // check if policy allows remote requests.
1589 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "routing_manager_impl::on_message: "
1590 << std::hex << "Security: Remote client with client ID 0x" << requester
1591 << " is not allowed to communicate with service/instance/method "
1592 << its_service << "/" << its_instance
1593 << "/" << its_method;
1594 return;
1595 }
1596 }
1597 }
1598 if (e2e_provider_) {
1599 its_method = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
1600 _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MIN],
1601 _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MAX]);
1602#ifndef ANDROID
1603 if (e2e_provider_->is_checked({its_service, its_method})) {
1604 auto its_base = e2e_provider_->get_protection_base({its_service, its_method});
1605 e2e_buffer its_buffer(_data + its_base, _data + _size);
1606 e2e_provider_->check({its_service, its_method},
1607 its_buffer, its_instance, its_check_status);
1608
1609 if (its_check_status != e2e::profile_interface::generic_check_status::E2E_OK) {
1610 VSOMEIP_INFO << "E2E protection: CRC check failed for service: "
1611 << std::hex << its_service << " method: " << its_method;
1612 }
1613 }
1614#endif
1615 }
1616
1617 // ACL check message
1618 if(!is_acl_message_allowed(_receiver, its_service, its_instance, _remote_address)) {
1619 return;
1620 }
1621
1622 // Common way of message handling
1623#ifdef USE_DLT
1624 is_forwarded =
1625#endif
1626 on_message(its_service, its_instance, _data, _size, _receiver->is_reliable(),
1627 _bound_client, _sec_client, its_check_status, true);
1628 }
1629 }
1630#ifdef USE_DLT
1631 if (is_forwarded) {
1632 trace::header its_header;
1633 const boost::asio::ip::address_v4 its_remote_address =
1634 _remote_address.is_v4() ? _remote_address.to_v4() :
1635 boost::asio::ip::address_v4::from_string("6.6.6.6");
1636 trace::protocol_e its_protocol =
1637 _receiver->is_local() ? trace::protocol_e::local :
1638 _receiver->is_reliable() ? trace::protocol_e::tcp :
1639 trace::protocol_e::udp;
1640 its_header.prepare(its_remote_address, _remote_port, its_protocol, false,
1641 its_instance);
1642 tc_->trace(its_header.data_, VSOMEIP_TRACE_HEADER_SIZE,
1643 _data, _size);
1644 }
1645#endif
1646}
1647
1648bool routing_manager_impl::on_message(service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
1649 const byte_t *_data, length_t _size, bool _reliable,
1650 client_t _bound_client, const vsomeip_sec_client_t *_sec_client,
1651 uint8_t _check_status, bool _is_from_remote) {
1652#if 0
1653 std::stringstream msg;
1654 msg << "rmi::on_message("
1655 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0')
1656 << _service << ", " << _instance << "): ";
1657 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < _size; ++i)
1658 msg << std::hex << std::setw(2) << std::setfill('0') << (int)_data[i] << " ";
1659 VSOMEIP_INFO << msg.str();
1660#endif
1661 client_t its_client;
1662 bool is_forwarded(true);
1663
1664 if (utility::is_request(_data[VSOMEIP_MESSAGE_TYPE_POS])) {
1665 its_client = find_local_client(_service, _instance);
1666 } else {
1667 its_client = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
1668 _data[VSOMEIP_CLIENT_POS_MIN],
1669 _data[VSOMEIP_CLIENT_POS_MAX]);
1670 }
1671
1672#if 0
1673 // ACL message check for local test purpouse
1674 std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> its_info = find_service(_service, _instance);
1675 if (its_info) {
1676 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> _receiver = its_info->get_endpoint(_reliable);
1677 if (_receiver && _receiver.get()) {
1678 if(!is_acl_message_allowed(_receiver.get(), _service, _instance,
1679 boost::asio::ip::address_v4::from_string("127.0.0.1"))) {
1680 return false;
1681 }
1682 }
1683 }
1684#endif
1685
1686 if (utility::is_notification(_data[VSOMEIP_MESSAGE_TYPE_POS])) {
1687 is_forwarded = deliver_notification(_service, _instance, _data, _size,
1688 _reliable, _bound_client, _sec_client, _check_status, _is_from_remote);
1689 } else if (its_client == host_->get_client()) {
1690 deliver_message(_data, _size, _instance,
1691 _reliable, _bound_client, _sec_client, _check_status, _is_from_remote);
1692 } else {
1693 send(its_client, _data, _size, _instance, _reliable,
1694 _bound_client, _sec_client, _check_status, _is_from_remote, false); //send to proxy
1695 }
1696 return is_forwarded;
1697}
1698
1699void routing_manager_impl::on_notification(client_t _client,
1700 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
1701 const byte_t *_data, length_t _size, bool _notify_one) {
1702 event_t its_event_id = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
1703 _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MIN], _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MAX]);
1704 std::shared_ptr<event> its_event = find_event(_service, _instance, its_event_id);
1705 if (its_event) {
1706 uint32_t its_length = utility::get_payload_size(_data, _size);
1707 std::shared_ptr<payload> its_payload =
1708 runtime::get()->create_payload(
1709 &_data[VSOMEIP_PAYLOAD_POS],
1710 its_length);
1711
1712 if (_notify_one) {
1713 notify_one(_service, _instance, its_event->get_event(),
1714 its_payload, _client, true
1715#ifdef VSOMEIP_ENABLE_COMPAT
1716 , false
1717#endif
1718 );
1719 } else {
1720 if (its_event->is_field()) {
1721 if (!its_event->set_payload_notify_pending(its_payload)) {
1722 its_event->set_payload(its_payload, false);
1723 }
1724 } else {
1725 its_event->set_payload(its_payload, VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT, true);
1726 }
1727 }
1728 }
1729}
1730
1731bool routing_manager_impl::is_last_stop_callback(const uint32_t _callback_id) {
1732 bool last_callback(false);
1733 auto found_id = callback_counts_.find(_callback_id);
1734 if (found_id != callback_counts_.end()) {
1735 found_id->second--;
1736 if (found_id->second == 0) {
1737 last_callback = true;
1738 }
1739 }
1740 if (last_callback) {
1741 callback_counts_.erase(_callback_id);
1742 }
1743 return last_callback;
1744}
1745
1746void routing_manager_impl::on_stop_offer_service(client_t _client, service_t _service,
1747 instance_t _instance, major_version_t _major, minor_version_t _minor) {
1748 {
1749 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(local_services_mutex_);
1750 auto found_service = local_services_.find(_service);
1751 if (found_service != local_services_.end()) {
1752 auto found_instance = found_service->second.find(_instance);
1753 if (found_instance != found_service->second.end()) {
1754 if ( std::get<0>(found_instance->second) != _major
1755 || std::get<1>(found_instance->second) != _minor
1756 || std::get<2>(found_instance->second) != _client) {
1757 VSOMEIP_WARNING
1758 << "routing_manager_impl::on_stop_offer_service: "
1759 << "trying to delete service not matching exactly "
1760 << "the one offered previously: " << "["
1761 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
1762 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
1763 << _instance << "." << std::dec << static_cast<std::uint32_t>(_major)
1764 << "." << _minor << "] by application: "
1765 << std::hex
1766 << std::setw(4) << _client << ". Stored: ["
1767 << std::setw(4) << _service
1768 << "." << _instance << "."
1769 << std::dec
1770 << static_cast<std::uint32_t>(std::get<0>(found_instance->second)) << "."
1771 << std::get<1>(found_instance->second)
1772 << "] by application: "
1773 << std::hex
1774 << std::setw(4) << std::get<2>(found_instance->second);
1775 }
1776 if (std::get<2>(found_instance->second) == _client) {
1777 found_service->second.erase(_instance);
1778 if (found_service->second.size() == 0) {
1779 local_services_.erase(_service);
1780 }
1781 }
1782 }
1783 }
1784 }
1785
1786 routing_manager_base::stop_offer_service(_client, _service, _instance,
1787 _major, _minor);
1788
1796 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> its_reliable_endpoint;
1797 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> its_unreliable_endpoint;
1798 std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> its_info(find_service(_service, _instance));
1799 if (its_info) {
1800 its_reliable_endpoint = its_info->get_endpoint(true);
1801 its_unreliable_endpoint = its_info->get_endpoint(false);
1802 static std::atomic<uint32_t> callback_id(0);
1803 const uint32_t its_callback_id = ++callback_id;
1804
1805 struct ready_to_stop_t {
1806 ready_to_stop_t() : reliable_(false), unreliable_(false){}
1807 std::atomic<bool> reliable_;
1808 std::atomic<bool> unreliable_;
1809 };
1810 auto ready_to_stop = std::make_shared<ready_to_stop_t>();
1811 auto ptr = shared_from_this();
1812
1813 auto callback = [&, its_callback_id, ptr, its_info, its_reliable_endpoint, its_unreliable_endpoint,
1814 ready_to_stop, _service, _instance, _major, _minor]
1815 (std::shared_ptr<endpoint> _endpoint, service_t _stopped_service) {
1816 (void)_stopped_service;
1817 if (its_reliable_endpoint && its_reliable_endpoint == _endpoint) {
1818 ready_to_stop->reliable_ = true;
1819 }
1820 if (its_unreliable_endpoint && its_unreliable_endpoint == _endpoint) {
1821 ready_to_stop->unreliable_ = true;
1822 }
1823 if ((its_unreliable_endpoint && !ready_to_stop->unreliable_) ||
1824 (its_reliable_endpoint && !ready_to_stop->reliable_)) {
1825 {
1826 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(callback_counts_mutex_);
1827 if (is_last_stop_callback(its_callback_id)) {
1828 erase_offer_command(_service, _instance);
1829 }
1830 }
1831 return;
1832 }
1833
1834 if (discovery_) {
1835 if (its_info->get_major() == _major && its_info->get_minor() == _minor) {
1836 discovery_->stop_offer_service(its_info, true);
1837 }
1838 }
1839 del_routing_info(_service, _instance, (its_reliable_endpoint != nullptr),
1840 (its_unreliable_endpoint != nullptr));
1841
1842 for (const auto& ep: {its_reliable_endpoint, its_unreliable_endpoint}) {
1843 if (ep) {
1844 if (ep_mgr_impl_->remove_instance(_service, ep.get())) {
1845 {
1846 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(callback_counts_mutex_);
1847 callback_counts_[its_callback_id]++;
1848 }
1849 // last instance -> pass ANY_INSTANCE and shutdown completely
1850 ep->prepare_stop(
1851 [&, _service, _instance, its_callback_id, ptr, its_reliable_endpoint, its_unreliable_endpoint]
1852 (std::shared_ptr<endpoint> _endpoint,
1853 service_t _stopped_service) {
1854 (void)_stopped_service;
1855 if (ep_mgr_impl_->remove_server_endpoint(
1856 _endpoint->get_local_port(),
1857 _endpoint->is_reliable())) {
1858 _endpoint->stop();
1859 }
1860 {
1861 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(callback_counts_mutex_);
1862 if (is_last_stop_callback(its_callback_id)) {
1863 erase_offer_command(_service, _instance);
1864 }
1865 }
1866 }, ANY_SERVICE);
1867 }
1868 // Clear service info and service group
1869 clear_service_info(_service, _instance, ep->is_reliable());
1870 }
1871 }
1872 {
1873 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(callback_counts_mutex_);
1874 if (is_last_stop_callback(its_callback_id)) {
1875 erase_offer_command(_service, _instance);
1876 }
1877 }
1878 };
1879
1880 // determine callback count
1881 for (const auto& ep : {its_reliable_endpoint, its_unreliable_endpoint}) {
1882 if (ep) {
1883 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(callback_counts_mutex_);
1884 auto found_id = callback_counts_.find(its_callback_id);
1885 if (found_id != callback_counts_.end()) {
1886 found_id->second++;
1887 } else {
1888 callback_counts_[its_callback_id] = 1;
1889 }
1890 }
1891 }
1892 for (const auto& ep : {its_reliable_endpoint, its_unreliable_endpoint}) {
1893 if (ep) {
1894 ep->prepare_stop(callback, _service);
1895 }
1896 }
1897
1898 if (!its_reliable_endpoint && !its_unreliable_endpoint) {
1899 {
1900 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(callback_counts_mutex_);
1901 callback_counts_.erase(its_callback_id);
1902 }
1903 erase_offer_command(_service, _instance);
1904 }
1905
1906 std::set<std::shared_ptr<eventgroupinfo> > its_eventgroup_info_set;
1907 {
1908 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_eventgroups_lock(eventgroups_mutex_);
1909 auto find_service = eventgroups_.find(_service);
1910 if (find_service != eventgroups_.end()) {
1911 auto find_instance = find_service->second.find(_instance);
1912 if (find_instance != find_service->second.end()) {
1913 for (auto e : find_instance->second) {
1914 its_eventgroup_info_set.insert(e.second);
1915 }
1916 }
1917 }
1918 }
1919
1920 for (auto e : its_eventgroup_info_set) {
1921 e->clear_remote_subscriptions();
1922 }
1923 } else {
1924 erase_offer_command(_service, _instance);
1925 }
1926}
1927
1928bool routing_manager_impl::deliver_message(const byte_t *_data, length_t _size,
1929 instance_t _instance, bool _reliable,
1930 client_t _bound_client, const vsomeip_sec_client_t *_sec_client,
1931 uint8_t _status_check, bool _is_from_remote) {
1932
1933 bool is_delivered(false);
1934
1935 auto its_deserializer = get_deserializer();
1936 its_deserializer->set_data(_data, _size);
1937 std::shared_ptr<message_impl> its_message(its_deserializer->deserialize_message());
1938 its_deserializer->reset();
1939 put_deserializer(its_deserializer);
1940
1941 if (its_message) {
1942 its_message->set_instance(_instance);
1943 its_message->set_reliable(_reliable);
1944 its_message->set_check_result(_status_check);
1945 if (_sec_client)
1946 its_message->set_sec_client(*_sec_client);
1947 its_message->set_env(get_env(_bound_client));
1948
1949 if (!_is_from_remote) {
1950 if (utility::is_notification(its_message->get_message_type())) {
1951 if (!is_response_allowed(_bound_client, its_message->get_service(),
1952 its_message->get_instance(), its_message->get_method())) {
1953 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "vSomeIP Security: Client 0x" << std::hex << get_client()
1954 << " : routing_manager_impl::deliver_message: "
1955 << std::hex << " received a notification from client 0x" << _bound_client
1956 << " which does not offer service/instance/event "
1957 << its_message->get_service() << "/" << its_message->get_instance()
1958 << "/" << its_message->get_method()
1959 << " ~> Skip message!";
1960 return false;
1961 } else {
1962 if (VSOMEIP_SEC_OK != security::is_client_allowed_to_access_member(get_sec_client(),
1963 its_message->get_service(), its_message->get_instance(),
1964 its_message->get_method())) {
1965 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "vSomeIP Security: Client 0x" << std::hex << get_client()
1966 << " : routing_manager_impl::deliver_message: "
1967 << " isn't allowed to receive a notification from service/instance/event "
1968 << its_message->get_service() << "/" << its_message->get_instance()
1969 << "/" << its_message->get_method()
1970 << " respectively from client 0x" << _bound_client
1971 << " ~> Skip message!";
1972 return false;
1973 }
1974 }
1975 } else if (utility::is_request(its_message->get_message_type())) {
1976 if (configuration_->is_security_enabled()
1977 && configuration_->is_local_routing()
1978 && its_message->get_client() != _bound_client) {
1979 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "vSomeIP Security: Client 0x" << std::hex << get_client()
1980 << " : routing_manager_impl::deliver_message:"
1981 << " received a request from client 0x" << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0')
1982 << its_message->get_client() << " to service/instance/method "
1983 << its_message->get_service() << "/" << its_message->get_instance()
1984 << "/" << its_message->get_method() << " which doesn't match the bound client 0x"
1985 << std::setw(4) << _bound_client
1986 << " ~> Skip message!";
1987 return false;
1988 }
1989
1990 if (VSOMEIP_SEC_OK != security::is_client_allowed_to_access_member(_sec_client,
1991 its_message->get_service(), its_message->get_instance(),
1992 its_message->get_method())) {
1993 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "vSomeIP Security: Client 0x" << std::hex << get_client()
1994 << " : routing_manager_impl::deliver_message: "
1995 << " isn't allowed to send a request to service/instance/method "
1996 << its_message->get_service() << "/" << its_message->get_instance()
1997 << "/" << its_message->get_method()
1998 << " ~> Skip message!";
1999 return false;
2000 }
2001 } else { // response
2002 if (!is_response_allowed(_bound_client, its_message->get_service(),
2003 its_message->get_instance(), its_message->get_method())) {
2004 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "vSomeIP Security: Client 0x" << std::hex << get_client()
2005 << " : routing_manager_impl::deliver_message: "
2006 << " received a response from client 0x" << _bound_client
2007 << " which does not offer service/instance/method "
2008 << its_message->get_service() << "/" << its_message->get_instance()
2009 << "/" << its_message->get_method()
2010 << " ~> Skip message!";
2011 return false;
2012 } else {
2013 if (VSOMEIP_SEC_OK != security::is_client_allowed_to_access_member(get_sec_client(),
2014 its_message->get_service(), its_message->get_instance(),
2015 its_message->get_method())) {
2016 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "vSomeIP Security: Client 0x" << std::hex << get_client()
2017 << " : routing_manager_impl::deliver_message: "
2018 << " isn't allowed to receive a response from service/instance/method "
2019 << its_message->get_service() << "/" << its_message->get_instance()
2020 << "/" << its_message->get_method()
2021 << " respectively from client 0x" << _bound_client
2022 << " ~> Skip message!";
2023 return false;
2024 }
2025 }
2026 }
2027 } else {
2028 if (!configuration_->is_remote_access_allowed()) {
2029 // if the message is from remote, check if
2030 // policy allows remote requests.
2031 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "vSomeIP Security: Client 0x" << std::hex << get_client()
2032 << " : routing_manager_impl::deliver_message: "
2033 << std::hex << "Remote clients are not allowed"
2034 << " to communicate with service/instance/method "
2035 << its_message->get_service() << "/" << its_message->get_instance()
2036 << "/" << its_message->get_method()
2037 << " respectively with client 0x" << get_client()
2038 << " ~> Skip message!";
2039 return false;
2040 } else if (utility::is_notification(its_message->get_message_type())) {
2041 if (VSOMEIP_SEC_OK != security::is_client_allowed_to_access_member(get_sec_client(),
2042 its_message->get_service(), its_message->get_instance(),
2043 its_message->get_method())) {
2044 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "vSomeIP Security: Client 0x" << std::hex << get_client()
2045 << " : routing_manager_impl::deliver_message: "
2046 << " isn't allowed to receive a notification from service/instance/event "
2047 << its_message->get_service() << "/" << its_message->get_instance()
2048 << "/" << its_message->get_method()
2049 << " respectively from remote client"
2050 << " ~> Skip message!";
2051 return false;
2052 }
2053 }
2054 }
2055
2056 host_->on_message(std::move(its_message));
2057 is_delivered = true;
2058 } else {
2059 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "Routing manager: deliver_message: "
2060 << "SomeIP-Header deserialization failed!";
2061 }
2062 return is_delivered;
2063}
2064
2065bool routing_manager_impl::deliver_notification(
2066 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
2067 const byte_t *_data, length_t _length, bool _reliable,
2068 client_t _bound_client, const vsomeip_sec_client_t *_sec_client,
2069 uint8_t _status_check, bool _is_from_remote) {
2070
2071 event_t its_event_id = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
2072 _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MIN], _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MAX]);
2073 client_t its_client_id = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
2074 _data[VSOMEIP_CLIENT_POS_MIN], _data[VSOMEIP_CLIENT_POS_MAX]);
2075
2076 std::shared_ptr<event> its_event = find_event(_service, _instance, its_event_id);
2077 if (its_event) {
2078 if (!its_event->is_provided()) {
2079 if (its_event->get_subscribers().size() == 0) {
2080 // no subscribers for this specific event / check subscriptions
2081 // to other events of the event's eventgroups
2082 bool cache_event = false;
2083 for (const auto eg : its_event->get_eventgroups()) {
2084 std::shared_ptr<eventgroupinfo> egi = find_eventgroup(_service, _instance, eg);
2085 if (egi) {
2086 for (const auto &e : egi->get_events()) {
2087 cache_event = (e->get_subscribers().size() > 0);
2088 if (cache_event) {
2089 break;
2090 }
2091 }
2092 if (cache_event) {
2093 break;
2094 }
2095 }
2096 }
2097 if (!cache_event) {
2098 VSOMEIP_WARNING << __func__ << ": dropping ["
2099 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
2100 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
2101 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
2102 << std::setw(4) << its_event_id
2103 << "]. No subscription to corresponding eventgroup.";
2104 return true; // as there is nothing to do
2105 }
2106 }
2107 }
2108
2109 auto its_length = utility::get_payload_size(_data, _length);
2110 auto its_payload = runtime::get()->create_payload(
2111 &_data[VSOMEIP_PAYLOAD_POS], its_length);
2112
2113 // incoming events statistics
2114 (void) insert_event_statistics(
2115 _service, _instance, its_event_id, its_length);
2116
2117 // Ignore the filter for messages coming from other local clients
2118 // as the filter was already applied there.
2119 auto its_subscribers
2120 = its_event->update_and_get_filtered_subscribers(its_payload, _is_from_remote);
2121 if (its_event->get_type() != event_type_e::ET_SELECTIVE_EVENT) {
2122 for (const auto its_local_client : its_subscribers) {
2123 if (its_local_client == host_->get_client()) {
2124 deliver_message(_data, _length, _instance, _reliable,
2125 _bound_client, _sec_client, _status_check, _is_from_remote);
2126 } else {
2127 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> its_local_target = find_local(its_local_client);
2128 if (its_local_target) {
2129 send_local(its_local_target, VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT,
2130 _data, _length, _instance, _reliable, protocol::id_e::SEND_ID, _status_check);
2131 }
2132 }
2133 }
2134 } else {
2135 // TODO: Check whether it makes more sense to set the client id
2136 // for internal selective events. This would create some extra
2137 // effort but we could avoid this hack.
2138 if (its_client_id == VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT)
2139 its_client_id = get_client();
2140
2141 if (its_subscribers.find(its_client_id) != its_subscribers.end()) {
2142 if (its_client_id == host_->get_client()) {
2143 deliver_message(_data, _length, _instance, _reliable,
2144 _bound_client, _sec_client, _status_check, _is_from_remote);
2145 } else {
2146 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> its_local_target = find_local(its_client_id);
2147 if (its_local_target) {
2148 send_local(its_local_target, VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT,
2149 _data, _length, _instance, _reliable, protocol::id_e::SEND_ID, _status_check);
2150 }
2151 }
2152 }
2153 }
2154
2155 } else {
2156 if (!is_suppress_event(_service, _instance, its_event_id)) {
2157 VSOMEIP_WARNING << __func__ << ": Event ["
2158 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _service << "."
2159 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _instance << "."
2160 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << its_event_id << "]"
2161 << " is not registered. The message is dropped.";
2162 }
2163 }
2164 return true;
2165}
2166
2167bool routing_manager_impl::is_suppress_event(service_t _service,
2168 instance_t _instance, event_t _event) const {
2169 bool status = configuration_->check_suppress_events(_service, _instance, _event);
2170
2171 return status;
2172}

2176 eventgroup_t _eventgroup) const {

2179
2180std::shared_ptr<endpoint> routing_manager_impl::create_service_discovery_endpoint(
2181 const std::string &_address, uint16_t _port, bool _reliable) {
2182 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> its_service_endpoint =
2183 ep_mgr_impl_->find_server_endpoint(_port, _reliable);
2184 if (!its_service_endpoint) {
2185 try {
2186 its_service_endpoint =
2187 ep_mgr_impl_->create_server_endpoint(_port,
2188 _reliable, true);
2189
2190 if (its_service_endpoint) {
2191 sd_info_ = std::make_shared<serviceinfo>(
2192 VSOMEIP_SD_SERVICE, VSOMEIP_SD_INSTANCE,
2193 ANY_MAJOR, ANY_MINOR, DEFAULT_TTL,
2194 false); // false, because we do _not_ want to announce it...
2195 sd_info_->set_endpoint(its_service_endpoint, _reliable);
2196 its_service_endpoint->add_default_target(VSOMEIP_SD_SERVICE,
2197 _address, _port);
2198 if (!_reliable) {
2199 auto its_server_endpoint = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<
2200 udp_server_endpoint_impl>(its_service_endpoint);
2201 if (its_server_endpoint)
2202 its_server_endpoint->join(_address);
2203 }
2204 } else {
2205 VSOMEIP_ERROR<< "Service Discovery endpoint could not be created. "
2206 "Please check your network configuration.";
2207 }
2208 } catch (const std::exception &e) {
2209 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "Server endpoint creation failed: Service "
2210 "Discovery endpoint could not be created: " << e.what();
2211 }
2212 }
2213 return its_service_endpoint;
2214}
2215
2216services_t routing_manager_impl::get_offered_services() const {
2217 services_t its_services;
2218 for (const auto& s : get_services()) {
2219 for (const auto& i : s.second) {
2220 if (i.second) {
2221 if (i.second->is_local()) {
2222 its_services[s.first][i.first] = i.second;
2223 }
2224 } else {
2225 VSOMEIP_ERROR << __func__ << "Found instance with NULL ServiceInfo ["
2226 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << s.first
2227 << ":" << i.first <<"]";
2228 }
2229 }
2230 }
2231 return its_services;
2232}
