2234std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> routing_manager_impl::get_offered_service(
2235 service_t _service, instance_t _instance) const {
2236 std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> its_info;
2237 its_info = find_service(_service, _instance);
2238 if (its_info && !its_info->is_local()) {
2239 its_info.reset();
2240 }
2241 return its_info;
2242}
2243
2244std::map<instance_t, std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo>>
2245routing_manager_impl::get_offered_service_instances(service_t _service) const {
2246 std::map<instance_t, std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo>> its_instances;
2247 const services_t its_services(get_services());
2248 const auto found_service = its_services.find(_service);
2249 if (found_service != its_services.end()) {
2250 for (const auto& i : found_service->second) {
2251 if (i.second->is_local()) {
2252 its_instances[i.first] = i.second;
2253 }
2254 }
2255 }
2256 return its_instances;
2257}
2258
2259bool routing_manager_impl::is_acl_message_allowed(endpoint *_receiver,
2260 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
2261 const boost::asio::ip::address &_remote_address) const {
2262 if (message_acceptance_handler_ && _receiver) {
2263 // Check the ACL whitelist rules if shall accepts the message
2264 std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> its_info(find_service(_service, _instance));
2265 const bool is_local = its_info && its_info->is_local();
2266
2267 message_acceptance_t message_acceptance {
2268#if VSOMEIP_BOOST_VERSION < 106600
2269 static_cast<uint32_t>(_remote_address.to_v4().to_ulong()),
2270#else
2271 _remote_address.to_v4().to_uint(),
2272#endif
2273 _receiver->get_local_port(), is_local, _service, _instance
2274 };
2275 if (!message_acceptance_handler_(message_acceptance)) {
2276 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "Message from " << _remote_address.to_string()
2277 << std::hex << " with service/instance " << _instance << "/"
2278 << _instance << " was rejected by the ACL check.";
2279 return false;
2280 }
2281 }
2282 return true;
2283}
2284
2286// PRIVATE
2288void routing_manager_impl::init_service_info(
2289 service_t _service, instance_t _instance, bool _is_local_service) {
2290 std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> its_info = find_service(_service, _instance);
2291 if (!its_info) {
2292 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "routing_manager_impl::init_service_info: couldn't "
2293 "find serviceinfo for service: ["
2294 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
2295 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
2296 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "]"
2297 << " is_local_service=" << _is_local_service;
2298 return;
2299 }
2300 if (configuration_) {
2301 // Create server endpoints for local services only
2302 if (_is_local_service) {
2303 const bool is_someip = configuration_->is_someip(_service, _instance);
2304 uint16_t its_reliable_port = configuration_->get_reliable_port(
2305 _service, _instance);
2306 bool _is_found(false);
2307 if (ILLEGAL_PORT != its_reliable_port) {
2308 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> its_reliable_endpoint =
2309 ep_mgr_impl_->find_or_create_server_endpoint(
2310 its_reliable_port, true, is_someip, _service,
2311 _instance, _is_found);
2312 if (its_reliable_endpoint) {
2313 its_info->set_endpoint(its_reliable_endpoint, true);
2314 }
2315 }
2316 uint16_t its_unreliable_port = configuration_->get_unreliable_port(
2317 _service, _instance);
2318 if (ILLEGAL_PORT != its_unreliable_port) {
2319 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> its_unreliable_endpoint =
2320 ep_mgr_impl_->find_or_create_server_endpoint(
2321 its_unreliable_port, false, is_someip, _service,
2322 _instance, _is_found);
2323 if (its_unreliable_endpoint) {
2324 its_info->set_endpoint(its_unreliable_endpoint, false);
2325 }
2326 }
2327
2328 if (ILLEGAL_PORT == its_reliable_port
2329 && ILLEGAL_PORT == its_unreliable_port) {
2330 VSOMEIP_INFO << "Port configuration missing for ["
2331 << std::hex << _service << "." << _instance
2332 << "]. Service is internal.";
2333 }
2334 }
2335 } else {
2336 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "Missing vsomeip configuration.";
2337 }
2338}
2339
2340void routing_manager_impl::remove_local(client_t _client, bool _remove_uid) {
2341 auto clients_subscriptions = get_subscriptions(_client);
2342 {
2343 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(remote_subscription_state_mutex_);
2344 for (const auto& s : clients_subscriptions) {
2345 remote_subscription_state_.erase(std::tuple_cat(s, std::make_tuple(_client)));
2346 }
2347 }
2348 routing_manager_base::remove_local(_client, clients_subscriptions, _remove_uid);
2349
2350 for (const auto &s : get_requested_services(_client)) {
2351 release_service(_client, s.first, s.second);
2352 }
2353}
2354
2355bool routing_manager_impl::is_field(service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
2356 event_t _event) const {
2357 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(events_mutex_);
2358 auto find_service = events_.find(_service);
2359 if (find_service != events_.end()) {
2360 auto find_instance = find_service->second.find(_instance);
2361 if (find_instance != find_service->second.end()) {
2362 auto find_event = find_instance->second.find(_event);
2363 if (find_event != find_instance->second.end())
2364 return find_event->second->is_field();
2365 }
2366 }
2367 return false;
2368}
2369
2370//only called from the SD
2371void routing_manager_impl::add_routing_info(
2372 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
2373 major_version_t _major, minor_version_t _minor, ttl_t _ttl,
2374 const boost::asio::ip::address &_reliable_address,
2375 uint16_t _reliable_port,
2376 const boost::asio::ip::address &_unreliable_address,
2377 uint16_t _unreliable_port) {
2378
2379 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(routing_state_mutex_);
2380 if (routing_state_ == routing_state_e::RS_SUSPENDED) {
2381 VSOMEIP_INFO << "rmi::" << __func__ << " We are suspended --> do nothing.";
2382 return;
2383 }
2384
2385 // Create/Update service info
2386 std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> its_info(find_service(_service, _instance));
2387 if (!its_info) {
2388 boost::asio::ip::address its_unicast_address
2389 = configuration_->get_unicast_address();
2390 bool is_local(false);
2391 if (_reliable_port != ILLEGAL_PORT
2392 && its_unicast_address == _reliable_address)
2393 is_local = true;
2394 else if (_unreliable_port != ILLEGAL_PORT
2395 && its_unicast_address == _unreliable_address)
2396 is_local = true;
2397
2398 its_info = create_service_info(_service, _instance, _major, _minor, _ttl, is_local);
2399 init_service_info(_service, _instance, is_local);
2400 } else if (its_info->is_local()) {
2401 // We received a service info for a service which is already offered locally
2402 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "routing_manager_impl::add_routing_info: "
2403 << "rejecting routing info. Remote: "
2404 << ((_reliable_port != ILLEGAL_PORT) ? _reliable_address.to_string()
2405 : _unreliable_address.to_string()) << " is trying to offer ["
2406 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
2407 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
2408 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
2409 << std::dec
2410 << static_cast<std::uint32_t>(_major) << "." << _minor
2411 << "] on port " << ((_reliable_port != ILLEGAL_PORT) ? _reliable_port
2412 : _unreliable_port) << " offered previously on this node: ["
2413 << std::hex
2414 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
2415 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
2416 << std::dec
2417 << static_cast<std::uint32_t>(its_info->get_major())
2418 << "." << its_info->get_minor() << "]";
2419 return;
2420 } else {
2421 its_info->set_ttl(_ttl);
2422 }
2423
2424 // Check whether remote services are unchanged
2425 bool is_reliable_known(false);
2426 bool is_unreliable_known(false);
2427 ep_mgr_impl_->is_remote_service_known(_service, _instance, _major,
2428 _minor, _reliable_address, _reliable_port, &is_reliable_known,
2429 _unreliable_address, _unreliable_port, &is_unreliable_known);
2430
2431 bool udp_inserted(false);
2432 bool tcp_inserted(false);
2433 // Add endpoint(s) if necessary
2434 if (_reliable_port != ILLEGAL_PORT && !is_reliable_known) {
2435 std::shared_ptr<endpoint_definition> endpoint_def_tcp
2436 = endpoint_definition::get(_reliable_address, _reliable_port, true, _service, _instance);
2437 if (_unreliable_port != ILLEGAL_PORT && !is_unreliable_known) {
2438 std::shared_ptr<endpoint_definition> endpoint_def_udp
2439 = endpoint_definition::get(_unreliable_address, _unreliable_port, false, _service, _instance);
2440 ep_mgr_impl_->add_remote_service_info(_service, _instance,
2441 endpoint_def_tcp, endpoint_def_udp);
2442 udp_inserted = true;
2443 tcp_inserted = true;
2444 } else {
2445 ep_mgr_impl_->add_remote_service_info(_service, _instance,
2446 endpoint_def_tcp);
2447 tcp_inserted = true;
2448 }
2449
2450 // check if service was requested and establish TCP connection if necessary
2451 {
2452 bool connected(false);
2453 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(requested_services_mutex_);
2454 for (const client_t its_client : get_requesters_unlocked(
2455 _service, _instance, _major, _minor)) {
2456 // SWS_SD_00376 establish TCP connection to service
2457 // service is marked as available later in on_connect()
2458 if (!connected) {
2459 if (udp_inserted) {
2460 // atomically create reliable and unreliable endpoint
2461 ep_mgr_impl_->find_or_create_remote_client(
2462 _service, _instance);
2463 } else {
2464 ep_mgr_impl_->find_or_create_remote_client(
2465 _service, _instance, true);
2466 }
2467 connected = true;
2468 }
2469 its_info->add_client(its_client);
2470 }
2471 }
2472 } else if (_reliable_port != ILLEGAL_PORT && is_reliable_known) {
2473 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(requested_services_mutex_);
2474 if (has_requester_unlocked(_service, _instance, _major, _minor)) {
2475 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> ep = its_info->get_endpoint(true);
2476 if (ep) {
2477 if (ep->is_established() &&
2478 stub_ &&
2479 !stub_->contained_in_routing_info(
2480 VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT, _service, _instance,
2481 its_info->get_major(),
2482 its_info->get_minor())) {
2483 on_availability(_service, _instance,
2484 availability_state_e::AS_AVAILABLE,
2485 its_info->get_major(), its_info->get_minor());
2486 stub_->on_offer_service(VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT,
2487 _service, _instance,
2488 its_info->get_major(),
2489 its_info->get_minor());
2490 if (discovery_) {
2491 discovery_->on_endpoint_connected(
2492 _service, _instance, ep);
2493 }
2494 }
2495 } else {
2496 // no endpoint yet, but requested -> create one
2497
2498 // SWS_SD_00376 establish TCP connection to service
2499 // service is marked as available later in on_connect()
2500 ep_mgr_impl_->find_or_create_remote_client(
2501 _service, _instance, true);
2502 for (const client_t its_client : get_requesters_unlocked(
2503 _service, _instance, _major, _minor)) {
2504 its_info->add_client(its_client);
2505 }
2506 }
2507 } else {
2508 on_availability(_service, _instance,
2509 availability_state_e::AS_OFFERED,
2510 its_info->get_major(), its_info->get_minor());
2511 }
2512 }
2513
2514 if (_unreliable_port != ILLEGAL_PORT && !is_unreliable_known) {
2515 if (!udp_inserted) {
2516 std::shared_ptr<endpoint_definition> endpoint_def
2517 = endpoint_definition::get(_unreliable_address, _unreliable_port, false, _service, _instance);
2518 ep_mgr_impl_->add_remote_service_info(_service, _instance, endpoint_def);
2519 // check if service was requested and increase requester count if necessary
2520 {
2521 bool connected(false);
2522 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(requested_services_mutex_);
2523 for (const client_t its_client : get_requesters_unlocked(
2524 _service, _instance, _major, _minor)) {
2525 if (!connected) {
2526 ep_mgr_impl_->find_or_create_remote_client(_service, _instance,
2527 false);
2528 connected = true;
2529 }
2530 its_info->add_client(its_client);
2531 }
2532 }
2533 }
2534 if (!is_reliable_known && !tcp_inserted) {
2535 // UDP only service can be marked as available instantly
2536 if (has_requester_unlocked(_service, _instance, _major, _minor)) {
2537 on_availability(_service, _instance,
2538 availability_state_e::AS_AVAILABLE, _major, _minor);
2539 if (stub_)
2540 stub_->on_offer_service(VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT, _service, _instance, _major, _minor);
2541 } else {
2542 on_availability(_service, _instance,
2543 availability_state_e::AS_OFFERED, _major, _minor);
2544 }
2545 }
2546 if (discovery_) {
2547 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> ep = its_info->get_endpoint(false);
2548 if (ep && ep->is_established()) {
2549 discovery_->on_endpoint_connected(_service, _instance, ep);
2550 }
2551 }
2552 } else if (_unreliable_port != ILLEGAL_PORT && is_unreliable_known) {
2553 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(requested_services_mutex_);
2554 if (has_requester_unlocked(_service, _instance, _major, _minor)) {
2555 if (_reliable_port == ILLEGAL_PORT && !is_reliable_known &&
2556 stub_ &&
2557 !stub_->contained_in_routing_info(
2558 VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT, _service, _instance,
2559 its_info->get_major(),
2560 its_info->get_minor())) {
2561 on_availability(_service, _instance,
2562 availability_state_e::AS_AVAILABLE,
2563 its_info->get_major(), its_info->get_minor());
2564 stub_->on_offer_service(VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT,
2565 _service, _instance,
2566 its_info->get_major(),
2567 its_info->get_minor());
2568 if (discovery_) {
2569 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> ep = its_info->get_endpoint(false);
2570 if (ep && ep->is_established()) {
2571 discovery_->on_endpoint_connected(
2572 _service, _instance,
2573 ep);
2574 }
2575 }
2576 }
2577 } else {
2578 on_availability(_service, _instance,
2579 availability_state_e::AS_OFFERED, _major, _minor);
2580 }
2581 }
2582}
2583
2584void routing_manager_impl::del_routing_info(service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
2585 bool _has_reliable, bool _has_unreliable) {
2586
2587 std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> its_info(find_service(_service, _instance));
2588 if(!its_info)
2589 return;
2590
2591 on_availability(_service, _instance,
2592 availability_state_e::AS_UNAVAILABLE,
2593 its_info->get_major(), its_info->get_minor());
2594 if (stub_)
2595 stub_->on_stop_offer_service(VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT, _service, _instance,
2596 its_info->get_major(), its_info->get_minor());
2597 // Implicit unsubscribe
2598
2599 std::vector<std::shared_ptr<event>> its_events;
2600 {
2601 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(eventgroups_mutex_);
2602 auto found_service = eventgroups_.find(_service);
2603 if (found_service != eventgroups_.end()) {
2604 auto found_instance = found_service->second.find(_instance);
2605 if (found_instance != found_service->second.end()) {
2606 for (auto &its_eventgroup : found_instance->second) {
2607 // As the service is gone, all subscriptions to its events
2608 // do no longer exist and the last received payload is no
2609 // longer valid.
2610 for (auto &its_event : its_eventgroup.second->get_events()) {
2611 const auto its_subscribers = its_event->get_subscribers();
2612 for (const auto its_subscriber : its_subscribers) {
2613 if (its_subscriber != get_client()) {
2614 its_event->remove_subscriber(
2615 its_eventgroup.first, its_subscriber);
2616 }
2617 }
2618 its_events.push_back(its_event);
2619 }
2620 }
2621 }
2622 }
2623 }
2624 for (const auto& e : its_events) {
2625 e->unset_payload(true);
2626 }
2627
2628 {
2629 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(remote_subscription_state_mutex_);
2630 std::set<std::tuple<
2631 service_t, instance_t, eventgroup_t, client_t> > its_invalid;
2632
2633 for (const auto &its_state : remote_subscription_state_) {
2634 if (std::get<0>(its_state.first) == _service
2635 && std::get<1>(its_state.first) == _instance) {
2636 its_invalid.insert(its_state.first);
2637 }
2638 }
2639
2640 for (const auto &its_key : its_invalid)
2641 remote_subscription_state_.erase(its_key);
2642 }
2643
2644 {
2645 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(remote_subscribers_mutex_);
2646 auto found_service = remote_subscribers_.find(_service);
2647 if (found_service != remote_subscribers_.end()) {
2648 if (found_service->second.erase(_instance) > 0 &&
2649 !found_service->second.size()) {
2650 remote_subscribers_.erase(found_service);
2651 }
2652 }
2653 }
2654
2655 if (_has_reliable) {
2656 ep_mgr_impl_->clear_client_endpoints(_service, _instance, true);
2657 ep_mgr_impl_->clear_remote_service_info(_service, _instance, true);
2658 }
2659 if (_has_unreliable) {
2660 ep_mgr_impl_->clear_client_endpoints(_service, _instance, false);
2661 ep_mgr_impl_->clear_remote_service_info(_service, _instance, false);
2662 }
2663
2664 ep_mgr_impl_->clear_multicast_endpoints(_service, _instance);
2665
2666 if (_has_reliable)
2667 clear_service_info(_service, _instance, true);
2668 if (_has_unreliable)
2669 clear_service_info(_service, _instance, false);
2670
2671 // For expired services using only unreliable endpoints that have never been created before
2672 if (!_has_reliable && !_has_unreliable) {
2673 ep_mgr_impl_->clear_remote_service_info(_service, _instance, true);
2674 ep_mgr_impl_->clear_remote_service_info(_service, _instance, false);
2675 clear_service_info(_service, _instance, true);
2676 clear_service_info(_service, _instance, false);
2677 }
2678}
2679
2680void routing_manager_impl::update_routing_info(std::chrono::milliseconds _elapsed) {
2681 std::map<service_t, std::vector<instance_t> > its_expired_offers;
2682
2683 {
2684 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(services_remote_mutex_);
2685 for (const auto &s : services_remote_) {
2686 for (const auto &i : s.second) {
2687 ttl_t its_ttl = i.second->get_ttl();
2688 if (its_ttl < DEFAULT_TTL) { // do not touch "forever"
2689 std::chrono::milliseconds precise_ttl = i.second->get_precise_ttl();
2690 if (precise_ttl.count() < _elapsed.count() || precise_ttl.count() == 0) {
2691 i.second->set_ttl(0);
2692 its_expired_offers[s.first].push_back(i.first);
2693 } else {
2694 std::chrono::milliseconds its_new_ttl(precise_ttl - _elapsed);
2695 i.second->set_precise_ttl(its_new_ttl);
2696 }
2697 }
2698 }
2699 }
2700 }
2701
2702 for (const auto &s : its_expired_offers) {
2703 for (const auto &i : s.second) {
2704 if (discovery_) {
2705 discovery_->unsubscribe_all(s.first, i);
2706 }
2707 del_routing_info(s.first, i, true, true);
2708 VSOMEIP_INFO << "update_routing_info: elapsed=" << _elapsed.count()
2709 << " : delete service/instance "
2710 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
2711 << std::setw(4) << s.first << "." << std::setw(4) << i;
2712 }
2713 }
2714}
2715
2716void routing_manager_impl::expire_services(
2717 const boost::asio::ip::address &_address) {
2718 expire_services(_address, configuration::port_range_t(ANY_PORT, ANY_PORT),
2719 false);
2720}
2721
2722void routing_manager_impl::expire_services(
2723 const boost::asio::ip::address &_address, std::uint16_t _port,
2724 bool _reliable) {
2725 expire_services(_address, configuration::port_range_t(_port, _port),
2726 _reliable);
2727}
2728
2729void routing_manager_impl::expire_services(
2730 const boost::asio::ip::address &_address,
2731 const configuration::port_range_t& _range, bool _reliable) {
2732 std::map<service_t, std::vector<instance_t> > its_expired_offers;
2733
2734 const bool expire_all = (_range.first == ANY_PORT
2735 && _range.second == ANY_PORT);
2736
2737 for (auto &s : get_services_remote()) {
2738 for (auto &i : s.second) {
2739 boost::asio::ip::address its_address;
2740 std::shared_ptr<client_endpoint> its_client_endpoint =
2741 std::dynamic_pointer_cast<client_endpoint>(
2742 i.second->get_endpoint(_reliable));
2743 if (!its_client_endpoint && expire_all) {
2744 its_client_endpoint = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<client_endpoint>(
2745 i.second->get_endpoint(!_reliable));
2746 }
2747 if (its_client_endpoint) {
2748 if ((expire_all || (its_client_endpoint->get_remote_port() >= _range.first
2749 && its_client_endpoint->get_remote_port() <= _range.second))
2750 && its_client_endpoint->get_remote_address(its_address)
2751 && its_address == _address) {
2752 if (discovery_) {
2753 discovery_->unsubscribe_all(s.first, i.first);
2754 }
2755 its_expired_offers[s.first].push_back(i.first);
2756 }
2757 }
2758 }
2759 }
2760
2761 for (auto &s : its_expired_offers) {
2762 for (auto &i : s.second) {
2763 VSOMEIP_INFO << "expire_services for address: " << _address
2764 << " : delete service/instance "
2765 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
2766 << std::setw(4) << s.first << "." << std::setw(4) << i
2767 << " port [" << std::dec << _range.first << "," << _range.second
2768 << "] reliability=" << std::boolalpha << _reliable;
2769 del_routing_info(s.first, i, true, true);
2770 }
2771 }
2772}
2773
2774void
2775routing_manager_impl::expire_subscriptions(
2776 const boost::asio::ip::address &_address) {
2777 expire_subscriptions(_address,
2778 configuration::port_range_t(ANY_PORT, ANY_PORT), false);
2779}
2780
2781void
2782routing_manager_impl::expire_subscriptions(
2783 const boost::asio::ip::address &_address, std::uint16_t _port,
2784 bool _reliable) {
2785 expire_subscriptions(_address, configuration::port_range_t(_port, _port),
2786 _reliable);
2787}
2788
2789void
2790routing_manager_impl::expire_subscriptions(
2791 const boost::asio::ip::address &_address,
2792 const configuration::port_range_t& _range, bool _reliable) {
2793 const bool expire_all = (_range.first == ANY_PORT
2794 && _range.second == ANY_PORT);
2795
2796 std::map<service_t,
2797 std::map<instance_t,
2798 std::map<eventgroup_t,
2799 std::shared_ptr<eventgroupinfo> > > >its_eventgroups;
2800 {
2801 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(eventgroups_mutex_);
2802 its_eventgroups = eventgroups_;
2803 }
2804 for (const auto &its_service : its_eventgroups) {
2805 for (const auto &its_instance : its_service.second) {
2806 for (const auto &its_eventgroup : its_instance.second) {
2807 const auto its_info = its_eventgroup.second;
2808 for (auto its_subscription
2809 : its_info->get_remote_subscriptions()) {
2810 // Note: get_remote_subscription delivers a copied
2811 // set of subscriptions. Thus, its is possible to
2812 // to remove them within the loop.
2813 auto its_ep_definition = _reliable ?
2814 its_subscription->get_reliable() :
2815 its_subscription->get_unreliable();
2816
2817 if (!its_ep_definition && expire_all)
2818 its_ep_definition = (!_reliable) ?
2819 its_subscription->get_reliable() :
2820 its_subscription->get_unreliable();
2821
2822 if (its_ep_definition
2823 && its_ep_definition->get_address() == _address
2824 && (expire_all ||
2825 (its_ep_definition->get_remote_port() >= _range.first
2826 && its_ep_definition->get_remote_port() <= _range.second))) {
2827
2828 // TODO: Check whether subscriptions to different hosts are valid.
2829 // IF yes, we probably need to simply reset the corresponding
2830 // endpoint instead of removing the subscription...
2831 VSOMEIP_INFO << __func__
2832 << ": removing subscription to "
2833 << std::hex << its_info->get_service() << "."
2834 << std::hex << its_info->get_instance() << "."
2835 << std::hex << its_info->get_eventgroup()
2836 << " from target "
2837 << its_ep_definition->get_address() << ":"
2838 << std::dec << its_ep_definition->get_port()
2839 << " reliable="
2840 << std::boolalpha << its_ep_definition->is_reliable();
2841 if (expire_all) {
2842 its_ep_definition = (!its_ep_definition->is_reliable()) ?
2843 its_subscription->get_reliable() :
2844 its_subscription->get_unreliable();
2845 if (its_ep_definition) {
2846 VSOMEIP_INFO << __func__
2847 << ": removing subscription to "
2848 << std::hex << its_info->get_service() << "."
2849 << std::hex << its_info->get_instance() << "."
2850 << std::hex << its_info->get_eventgroup()
2851 << " from target "
2852 << its_ep_definition->get_address() << ":"
2853 << std::dec << its_ep_definition->get_port()
2854 << " reliable="
2855 << std::boolalpha << its_ep_definition->is_reliable();
2856 }
2857 }
2858 on_remote_unsubscribe(its_subscription);
2859 }
2860 }
2861 }
2862 }
2863 }
2864}
2865
2866void routing_manager_impl::init_routing_info() {
2867 VSOMEIP_INFO<< "Service Discovery disabled. Using static routing information.";
2868 for (auto i : configuration_->get_remote_services()) {
2869 boost::asio::ip::address its_address(
2870 boost::asio::ip::address::from_string(
2871 configuration_->get_unicast_address(i.first, i.second)));
2872 uint16_t its_reliable_port
2873 = configuration_->get_reliable_port(i.first, i.second);
2874 uint16_t its_unreliable_port
2875 = configuration_->get_unreliable_port(i.first, i.second);
2876
2877 if (its_reliable_port != ILLEGAL_PORT
2878 || its_unreliable_port != ILLEGAL_PORT) {
2879
2880 add_routing_info(i.first, i.second,
2881 DEFAULT_MAJOR, DEFAULT_MINOR, DEFAULT_TTL,
2882 its_address, its_reliable_port,
2883 its_address, its_unreliable_port);
2884
2885 if(its_reliable_port != ILLEGAL_PORT) {
2886 ep_mgr_impl_->find_or_create_remote_client(
2887 i.first, i.second, true);
2888 }
2889 if(its_unreliable_port != ILLEGAL_PORT) {
2890 ep_mgr_impl_->find_or_create_remote_client(
2891 i.first, i.second, false);
2892 }
2893 }
2894 }
2895}
2896
2897void routing_manager_impl::on_remote_subscribe(
2898 std::shared_ptr<remote_subscription> &_subscription,
2899 const remote_subscription_callback_t &_callback) {
2900
2901 auto its_eventgroupinfo = _subscription->get_eventgroupinfo();
2902 if (!its_eventgroupinfo) {
2903 VSOMEIP_ERROR << __func__ << " eventgroupinfo is invalid";
2904 return;
2905 }
2906
2907 const ttl_t its_ttl = _subscription->get_ttl();
2908
2909 const auto its_service = its_eventgroupinfo->get_service();
2910 const auto its_instance = its_eventgroupinfo->get_instance();
2911 const auto its_eventgroup = its_eventgroupinfo->get_eventgroup();
2912 const auto its_major = its_eventgroupinfo->get_major();
2913
2914 // Get remote port(s)
2915 auto its_reliable = _subscription->get_reliable();
2916 if (its_reliable) {
2917 uint16_t its_port
2918 = configuration_->get_reliable_port(its_service, its_instance);
2919 its_reliable->set_remote_port(its_port);
2920 }
2921
2922 auto its_unreliable = _subscription->get_unreliable();
2923 if (its_unreliable) {
2924 uint16_t its_port
2925 = configuration_->get_unreliable_port(its_service, its_instance);
2926 its_unreliable->set_remote_port(its_port);
2927 }
2928
2929 // Calculate expiration time
2930 const std::chrono::steady_clock::time_point its_expiration
2931 = std::chrono::steady_clock::now() + std::chrono::seconds(its_ttl);
2932
2933 // Try to update the subscription. This will fail, if the subscription does
2934 // not exist or is still (partly) pending.
2935 remote_subscription_id_t its_id;
2936 std::set<client_t> its_added;
2937 update_remote_subscription_mutex_.lock();
2938 auto its_result = its_eventgroupinfo->update_remote_subscription(
2939 _subscription, its_expiration, its_added, its_id, true);
2940 if (its_result) {
2941 if (!_subscription->is_pending()) { // resubscription without change
2942 update_remote_subscription_mutex_.unlock();
2943 _callback(_subscription);
2944 } else if (!its_added.empty()) { // new clients for a selective subscription
2945 const client_t its_offering_client
2946 = find_local_client(its_service, its_instance);
2947 send_subscription(its_offering_client,
2948 its_service, its_instance, its_eventgroup, its_major,
2949 its_added, _subscription->get_id());
2950 update_remote_subscription_mutex_.unlock();
2951 } else { // identical subscription is not yet processed
2952 std::stringstream its_warning;
2953 its_warning << __func__ << " a remote subscription is already pending ["
2954 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
2955 << std::setw(4) << its_service << "."
2956 << std::setw(4) << its_instance << "."
2957 << std::setw(4) << its_eventgroup << "]"
2958 << " from ";
2959 if (its_reliable && its_unreliable)
2960 its_warning << "[";
2961 if (its_reliable)
2962 its_warning << its_reliable->get_address().to_string()
2963 << ":" << std::dec << its_reliable->get_port();
2964 if (its_reliable && its_unreliable)
2965 its_warning << ", ";
2966 if (its_unreliable)
2967 its_warning << its_unreliable->get_address().to_string()
2968 << ":" << std::dec << its_unreliable->get_port();
2969 if (its_reliable && its_unreliable)
2970 its_warning << "]";
2971 VSOMEIP_WARNING << its_warning.str();
2972
2973 update_remote_subscription_mutex_.unlock();
2974 _callback(_subscription);
2975 }
2976 } else { // new subscription
2977 if (its_eventgroupinfo->is_remote_subscription_limit_reached(
2978 _subscription)) {
2979 _subscription->set_all_client_states(
2980 remote_subscription_state_e::SUBSCRIPTION_NACKED);
2981
2982 update_remote_subscription_mutex_.unlock();
2983 _callback(_subscription);
2984 return;
2985 }
2986
2987 auto its_id
2988 = its_eventgroupinfo->add_remote_subscription(_subscription);
2989
2990 const client_t its_offering_client
2991 = find_local_client(its_service, its_instance);
2992 send_subscription(its_offering_client,
2993 its_service, its_instance, its_eventgroup, its_major,
2994 _subscription->get_clients(), its_id);
2995 update_remote_subscription_mutex_.unlock();
2996 }
2997}
2998
2999void routing_manager_impl::on_remote_unsubscribe(
3000 std::shared_ptr<remote_subscription> &_subscription) {
3001 std::shared_ptr<eventgroupinfo> its_info
3002 = _subscription->get_eventgroupinfo();
3003 if (!its_info) {
3004 VSOMEIP_ERROR << __func__
3005 << ": Received Unsubscribe for unregistered eventgroup.";
3006 return;
3007 }
3008
3009 const auto its_service = its_info->get_service();
3010 const auto its_instance = its_info->get_instance();
3011 const auto its_eventgroup = its_info->get_eventgroup();
3012 const auto its_major = its_info->get_major();
3013
3014 // Get remote port(s)
3015 auto its_reliable = _subscription->get_reliable();
3016 if (its_reliable) {
3017 uint16_t its_port
3018 = configuration_->get_reliable_port(its_service, its_instance);
3019 its_reliable->set_remote_port(its_port);
3020 }
3021
3022 auto its_unreliable = _subscription->get_unreliable();
3023 if (its_unreliable) {
3024 uint16_t its_port
3025 = configuration_->get_unreliable_port(its_service, its_instance);
3026 its_unreliable->set_remote_port(its_port);
3027 }
3028
3029 remote_subscription_id_t its_id(0);
3030 std::set<client_t> its_removed;
3031 update_remote_subscription_mutex_.lock();
3032 auto its_result = its_info->update_remote_subscription(
3033 _subscription, std::chrono::steady_clock::now(),
3034 its_removed, its_id, false);
3035
3036 if (its_result) {
3037 const client_t its_offering_client
3038 = find_local_client(its_service, its_instance);
3039 send_unsubscription(its_offering_client,
3040 its_service, its_instance, its_eventgroup, its_major,
3041 its_removed, its_id);
3042 }
3043
3044 update_remote_subscription_mutex_.unlock();
3045}

3054
3055void routing_manager_impl::on_subscribe_ack(client_t _client,
3056 service_t _service, instance_t _instance, eventgroup_t _eventgroup,
3057 event_t _event, remote_subscription_id_t _id) {
3058 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(remote_subscription_state_mutex_);
3059 auto its_eventgroup = find_eventgroup(_service, _instance, _eventgroup);
3060 if (its_eventgroup) {
3061 auto its_subscription = its_eventgroup->get_remote_subscription(_id);
3062 if (its_subscription) {
3063 its_subscription->set_client_state(_client,
3064 remote_subscription_state_e::SUBSCRIPTION_ACKED);
3065
3066 auto its_parent = its_subscription->get_parent();
3067 if (its_parent) {
3068 its_parent->set_client_state(_client,
3069 remote_subscription_state_e::SUBSCRIPTION_ACKED);
3070 if (!its_subscription->is_pending()) {
3071 its_eventgroup->remove_remote_subscription(_id);
3072 }
3073 }
3074
3075 if (discovery_) {
3076 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(remote_subscribers_mutex_);
3077 remote_subscribers_[_service][_instance][VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT].insert(
3078 its_subscription->get_subscriber());
3079 discovery_->update_remote_subscription(its_subscription);
3080
3081 VSOMEIP_INFO << "REMOTE SUBSCRIBE("
3082 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
3083 << std::setw(4) << _client << "): ["
3084 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
3085 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
3086 << std::setw(4) << _eventgroup << "]"
3087 << " from " << its_subscription->get_subscriber()->get_address()
3088 << ":" << std::dec << its_subscription->get_subscriber()->get_port()
3089 << (its_subscription->get_subscriber()->is_reliable() ? " reliable" : " unreliable")
3090 << " was accepted";
3091
3092 return;
3093 }
3094 } else {
3095 const auto its_tuple = std::make_tuple(_service, _instance, _eventgroup, _client);
3096 const auto its_state = remote_subscription_state_.find(its_tuple);
3097 if (its_state != remote_subscription_state_.end()) {
3098 if (its_state->second == subscription_state_e::SUBSCRIPTION_ACKNOWLEDGED) {
3099 // Already notified!
3100 return;
3101 }
3102 }
3103 remote_subscription_state_[its_tuple] = subscription_state_e::SUBSCRIPTION_ACKNOWLEDGED;
3104 }
3105
3106 std::set<client_t> subscribed_clients;
3107 if (_client == VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT) {
3108 for (const auto &its_event : its_eventgroup->get_events()) {
3109 if (_event == ANY_EVENT || _event == its_event->get_event()) {
3110 const auto &its_subscribers = its_event->get_subscribers();
3111 subscribed_clients.insert(its_subscribers.begin(), its_subscribers.end());
3112 }
3113 }
3114 } else {
3115 subscribed_clients.insert(_client);
3116 }
3117
3118 for (const auto &its_subscriber : subscribed_clients) {
3119 if (its_subscriber == get_client()) {
3120 if (_event == ANY_EVENT) {
3121 for (const auto &its_event : its_eventgroup->get_events()) {
3122 host_->on_subscription_status(_service, _instance,
3123 _eventgroup, its_event->get_event(),
3124 0x0 /*OK*/);
3125 }
3126 } else {
3127 host_->on_subscription_status(_service, _instance,
3128 _eventgroup, _event, 0x0 /*OK*/);
3129 }
3130 } else if (stub_) {
3131 stub_->send_subscribe_ack(its_subscriber, _service,
3132 _instance, _eventgroup, _event);
3133 }
3134 }
3135 }
3136}
3137
3138std::shared_ptr<endpoint> routing_manager_impl::find_or_create_remote_client(
3139 service_t _service, instance_t _instance, bool _reliable) {
3140 return ep_mgr_impl_->find_or_create_remote_client(_service,
3141 _instance, _reliable);
3142}
3143
3144void routing_manager_impl::on_subscribe_nack(client_t _client,
3145 service_t _service, instance_t _instance, eventgroup_t _eventgroup,
3146 bool _remove, remote_subscription_id_t _id) {
3147
3148 auto its_eventgroup = find_eventgroup(_service, _instance, _eventgroup);
3149 if (its_eventgroup) {
3150 auto its_subscription = its_eventgroup->get_remote_subscription(_id);
3151 if (its_subscription) {
3152 its_subscription->set_client_state(_client,
3153 remote_subscription_state_e::SUBSCRIPTION_NACKED);
3154
3155 auto its_parent = its_subscription->get_parent();
3156 if (its_parent) {
3157 its_parent->set_client_state(_client,
3158 remote_subscription_state_e::SUBSCRIPTION_NACKED);
3159 if (!its_subscription->is_pending()) {
3160 its_eventgroup->remove_remote_subscription(_id);
3161 }
3162 }
3163
3164 if (discovery_) {
3165 discovery_->update_remote_subscription(its_subscription);
3166 VSOMEIP_INFO << "REMOTE SUBSCRIBE("
3167 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
3168 << std::setw(4) << _client << "): ["
3169 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
3170 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
3171 << std::setw(4) << _eventgroup << "]"
3172 << " from " << its_subscription->get_subscriber()->get_address()
3173 << ":" << std::dec << its_subscription->get_subscriber()->get_port()
3174 << (its_subscription->get_subscriber()->is_reliable() ? " reliable" : " unreliable")
3175 << " was not accepted";
3176 }
3177 if (_remove)
3178 its_eventgroup->remove_remote_subscription(_id);
3179 }
3180 }

3182
3183return_code_e routing_manager_impl::check_error(const byte_t *_data, length_t _size,
3184 instance_t _instance) {
3185
3186 service_t its_service = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(_data[VSOMEIP_SERVICE_POS_MIN],
3187 _data[VSOMEIP_SERVICE_POS_MAX]);
3188
3189 if (_size >= VSOMEIP_PAYLOAD_POS) {
3190 if (utility::is_request(_data[VSOMEIP_MESSAGE_TYPE_POS])
3191 || utility::is_request_no_return(_data[VSOMEIP_MESSAGE_TYPE_POS]) ) {
3192 if (_data[VSOMEIP_PROTOCOL_VERSION_POS] != VSOMEIP_PROTOCOL_VERSION) {
3193 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "Received a message with unsupported protocol version for service 0x"
3194 << std::hex << its_service;
3195 return return_code_e::E_WRONG_PROTOCOL_VERSION;
3196 }
3197 if (_instance == 0xFFFF) {
3198 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "Receiving endpoint is not configured for service 0x"
3199 << std::hex << its_service;
3200 return return_code_e::E_UNKNOWN_SERVICE;
3201 }
3202 // Check interface version of service/instance
3203 auto its_info = find_service(its_service, _instance);
3204 if (its_info) {
3205 major_version_t its_version = _data[VSOMEIP_INTERFACE_VERSION_POS];
3206 if (its_version != its_info->get_major()) {
3207 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "Received a message with unsupported interface version for service 0x"
3208 << std::hex << its_service;
3209 return return_code_e::E_WRONG_INTERFACE_VERSION;
3210 }
3211 }
3212 if (_data[VSOMEIP_RETURN_CODE_POS] != static_cast<byte_t> (return_code_e::E_OK)) {
3213 // Request calls must to have return code E_OK set!
3214 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "Received a message with unsupported return code set for service 0x"
3215 << std::hex << its_service;
3216 return return_code_e::E_NOT_OK;
3217 }
3218 }
3219 } else {
3220 // Message shorter than vSomeIP message header
3221 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "Received a message message which is shorter than vSomeIP message header!";
3222 return return_code_e::E_MALFORMED_MESSAGE;
3223 }
3224 return return_code_e::E_OK;
3225}
3226
3227void routing_manager_impl::send_error(return_code_e _return_code,
3228 const byte_t *_data, length_t _size,
3229 instance_t _instance, bool _reliable,
3230 endpoint* const _receiver,
3231 const boost::asio::ip::address &_remote_address,
3232 std::uint16_t _remote_port) {
3233
3234 client_t its_client = 0;
3235 service_t its_service = 0;
3236 method_t its_method = 0;
3237 session_t its_session = 0;
3238 major_version_t its_version = 0;
3239
3240 if (_size >= VSOMEIP_CLIENT_POS_MAX) {
3241 its_client = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(_data[VSOMEIP_CLIENT_POS_MIN],
3242 _data[VSOMEIP_CLIENT_POS_MAX]);
3243 }
3244 if (_size >= VSOMEIP_SERVICE_POS_MAX) {
3245 its_service = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
3246 _data[VSOMEIP_SERVICE_POS_MIN], _data[VSOMEIP_SERVICE_POS_MAX]);
3247 }
3248 if (_size >= VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MAX) {
3249 its_method = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(
3250 _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MIN], _data[VSOMEIP_METHOD_POS_MAX]);
3251 }
3252 if (_size >= VSOMEIP_SESSION_POS_MAX) {
3253 its_session = VSOMEIP_BYTES_TO_WORD(_data[VSOMEIP_SESSION_POS_MIN],
3254 _data[VSOMEIP_SESSION_POS_MAX]);
3255 }
3256 if( _size >= VSOMEIP_INTERFACE_VERSION_POS) {
3257 its_version = _data[VSOMEIP_INTERFACE_VERSION_POS];
3258 }
3259
3260 auto error_message = runtime::get()->create_message(_reliable);
3261 error_message->set_client(its_client);
3262 error_message->set_instance(_instance);
3263 error_message->set_interface_version(its_version);
3264 error_message->set_message_type(message_type_e::MT_ERROR);
3265 error_message->set_method(its_method);
3266 error_message->set_return_code(_return_code);
3267 error_message->set_service(its_service);
3268 error_message->set_session(its_session);
3269 {
3270 std::shared_ptr<serializer> its_serializer(get_serializer());
3271 if (its_serializer->serialize(error_message.get())) {
3272 if (_receiver) {
3273 auto its_endpoint_def = std::make_shared<endpoint_definition>(
3274 _remote_address, _remote_port,
3275 _receiver->is_reliable());
3276 its_endpoint_def->set_remote_port(_receiver->get_local_port());
3277 std::shared_ptr<endpoint> its_endpoint =
3278 ep_mgr_impl_->find_server_endpoint(
3279 its_endpoint_def->get_remote_port(),
3280 its_endpoint_def->is_reliable());
3281 if (its_endpoint) {
3282 #ifdef USE_DLT
3283 trace::header its_header;
3284 if (its_header.prepare(its_endpoint, true, _instance))
3285 tc_->trace(its_header.data_, VSOMEIP_TRACE_HEADER_SIZE,
3286 _data, _size);
3287 #else
3288 (void) _instance;
3289 #endif
3290 its_endpoint->send_error(its_endpoint_def,
3291 its_serializer->get_data(), its_serializer->get_size());
3292 }
3293 }
3294 its_serializer->reset();
3295 put_serializer(its_serializer);
3296 } else {
3297 VSOMEIP_ERROR<< "Failed to serialize error message.";
3298 }
3299 }
3300}
3301
3302void routing_manager_impl::clear_remote_subscriber(
3303 service_t _service, instance_t _instance, client_t _client,
3304 const std::shared_ptr<endpoint_definition> &_target) {
3305 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(remote_subscribers_mutex_);
3306 auto its_service = remote_subscribers_.find(_service);
3307 if (its_service != remote_subscribers_.end()) {
3308 auto its_instance = its_service->second.find(_instance);
3309 if (its_instance != its_service->second.end()) {
3310 auto its_client = its_instance->second.find(_client);
3311 if (its_client != its_instance->second.end()) {
3312 if (its_client->second.erase(_target)) {
3313 if (!its_client->second.size()) {
3314 its_instance->second.erase(_client);
3315 }
3316 }
3317 }
3318 }
3319 }
3320}
3321
3322std::chrono::steady_clock::time_point
3323routing_manager_impl::expire_subscriptions(bool _force) {
3324 std::map<service_t,
3325 std::map<instance_t,
3326 std::map<eventgroup_t,
3327 std::shared_ptr<eventgroupinfo> > > >its_eventgroups;
3328 std::map<std::shared_ptr<remote_subscription>,
3329 std::set<client_t> > its_expired_subscriptions;
3330
3331 std::chrono::steady_clock::time_point now
3332 = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
3333 std::chrono::steady_clock::time_point its_next_expiration
3334 = std::chrono::steady_clock::now() + std::chrono::hours(24);
3335 {
3336 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(eventgroups_mutex_);
3337 its_eventgroups = eventgroups_;
3338 }
3339
3340 for (auto &its_service : its_eventgroups) {
3341 for (auto &its_instance : its_service.second) {
3342 for (auto &its_eventgroup : its_instance.second) {
3343 auto its_subscriptions
3344 = its_eventgroup.second->get_remote_subscriptions();
3345 for (auto &s : its_subscriptions) {
3346 if(!s) {
3347 VSOMEIP_ERROR << __func__
3348 << ": Remote subscription is NULL for eventgroup ["
3349 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
3350 << std::setw(4) << its_service.first << "."
3351 << std::setw(4) << its_instance.first << "."
3352 << std::setw(4) << its_eventgroup.first << "]";
3353 continue;
3354 }
3355 for (auto its_client : s->get_clients()) {
3356 if (_force) {
3357 its_expired_subscriptions[s].insert(its_client);
3358 } else {
3359 auto its_expiration = s->get_expiration(its_client);
3360 if (its_expiration != std::chrono::steady_clock::time_point()) {
3361 if (its_expiration < now) {
3362 its_expired_subscriptions[s].insert(its_client);
3363 } else if (its_expiration < its_next_expiration) {
3364 its_next_expiration = its_expiration;
3365 }
3366 }
3367 }
3368 }
3369 }
3370 }
3371 }
3372 }
3373
3374 for (auto &s : its_expired_subscriptions) {
3375 auto its_info = s.first->get_eventgroupinfo();
3376 if (its_info) {
3377 auto its_service = its_info->get_service();
3378 auto its_instance = its_info->get_instance();
3379 auto its_eventgroup = its_info->get_eventgroup();
3380
3381 remote_subscription_id_t its_id;
3382 update_remote_subscription_mutex_.lock();
3383 auto its_result = its_info->update_remote_subscription(
3384 s.first, std::chrono::steady_clock::now(),
3385 s.second, its_id, false);
3386 if (its_result) {
3387 const client_t its_offering_client
3388 = find_local_client(its_service, its_instance);
3389 const auto its_subscription = its_info->get_remote_subscription(its_id);
3390 if (its_subscription) {
3391 its_info->remove_remote_subscription(its_id);
3392
3393 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(remote_subscribers_mutex_);
3394 remote_subscribers_[its_service][its_instance].erase(its_offering_client);
3395
3396 if (its_info->get_remote_subscriptions().size() == 0) {
3397 for (const auto &its_event : its_info->get_events()) {
3398 bool has_remote_subscriber(false);
3399 for (const auto &its_eventgroup : its_event->get_eventgroups()) {
3400 const auto its_eventgroup_info
3401 = find_eventgroup(its_service, its_instance, its_eventgroup);
3402 if (its_eventgroup_info
3403 && its_eventgroup_info->get_remote_subscriptions().size() > 0) {
3404 has_remote_subscriber = true;
3405 }
3406 }
3407 if (!has_remote_subscriber && its_event->is_shadow()) {
3408 its_event->unset_payload();
3409 }
3410 }
3411 }
3412 } else {
3413 VSOMEIP_ERROR << __func__
3414 << ": Unknown expired subscription " << std::dec << its_id << " for eventgroup ["
3415 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
3416 << std::setw(4) << its_service << "."
3417 << std::setw(4) << its_instance << "."
3418 << std::setw(4) << its_eventgroup << "]";
3419 }
3420 send_expired_subscription(its_offering_client,
3421 its_service, its_instance, its_eventgroup,
3422 s.second, s.first->get_id());
3423 }
3424 update_remote_subscription_mutex_.unlock();
3425
3426 if (s.first->get_unreliable()) {
3427 VSOMEIP_INFO << (_force ? "Removed" : "Expired") << " subscription ["
3428 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
3429 << std::setw(4) << its_service << "."
3430 << std::setw(4) << its_instance << "."
3431 << std::setw(4) << its_eventgroup << "] unreliable from "
3432 << s.first->get_unreliable()->get_address() << ":"
3433 << std::dec << s.first->get_unreliable()->get_port();
3434 }
3435
3436 if (s.first->get_reliable()) {
3437 VSOMEIP_INFO << (_force ? "Removed" : "Expired") << " subscription ["
3438 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
3439 << std::setw(4) << its_service << "."
3440 << std::setw(4) << its_instance << "."
3441 << std::setw(4) << its_eventgroup << "] reliable from "
3442 << s.first->get_reliable()->get_address() << ":"
3443 << std::dec << s.first->get_reliable()->get_port();
3444 }
3445 }
3446 }
3447
3448 return its_next_expiration;
3449}
3450
3451void routing_manager_impl::log_version_timer_cbk(boost::system::error_code const & _error) {
3452 if (!_error) {
3453 static int its_counter(0);
3454 static uint32_t its_interval = configuration_->get_log_version_interval();
3455
3456 bool is_diag_mode(false);
3457
3458 if (discovery_) {
3459 is_diag_mode = discovery_->get_diagnosis_mode();
3460 }
3461 std::stringstream its_last_resume;
3462 {
3463 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(routing_state_mutex_);
3464 if (last_resume_ != std::chrono::steady_clock::time_point::min()) {
3465 its_last_resume << " | " << std::dec
3466 << std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::seconds>(
3467 std::chrono::steady_clock::now() - last_resume_).count() << "s";
3468 }
3469 }
3470
3471 VSOMEIP_INFO << "vSomeIP " << VSOMEIP_VERSION << " | ("
3472 << ((is_diag_mode == true) ? "diagnosis)" : "default)")
3473 << its_last_resume.str();
3474
3475 its_counter++;
3476 if (its_counter == 6) {
3477 ep_mgr_->log_client_states();
3478 ep_mgr_impl_->log_client_states();
3479 its_counter = 0;
3480 }
3481
3482 {
3483 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(version_log_timer_mutex_);
3484 version_log_timer_.expires_from_now(std::chrono::seconds(its_interval));
3485 version_log_timer_.async_wait(
3486 std::bind(&routing_manager_impl::log_version_timer_cbk,
3487 this, std::placeholders::_1));
3488 }
3489 }
3490}
3491
3492bool routing_manager_impl::handle_local_offer_service(client_t _client, service_t _service,
3493 instance_t _instance, major_version_t _major,minor_version_t _minor) {
3494 {
3495 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(local_services_mutex_);
3496 auto found_service = local_services_.find(_service);
3497 if (found_service != local_services_.end()) {
3498 auto found_instance = found_service->second.find(_instance);
3499 if (found_instance != found_service->second.end()) {
3500 const major_version_t its_stored_major(std::get<0>(found_instance->second));
3501 const minor_version_t its_stored_minor(std::get<1>(found_instance->second));
3502 const client_t its_stored_client(std::get<2>(found_instance->second));
3503 if ( its_stored_major == _major
3504 && its_stored_minor == _minor
3505 && its_stored_client == _client) {
3506 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "routing_manager_impl::handle_local_offer_service: "
3507 << "Application: "
3508 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
3509 << std::setw(4) << _client << " is offering: ["
3510 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
3511 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
3512 << std::dec << static_cast<std::uint32_t>(_major) << "."
3513 << _minor << "] offered previously by itself.";
3514 return false;
3515 } else if ( its_stored_major == _major
3516 && its_stored_minor == _minor
3517 && its_stored_client != _client) {
3518 // check if previous offering application is still alive
3519 bool already_pinged(false);
3520 {
3521 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(pending_offers_mutex_);
3522 auto found_service2 = pending_offers_.find(_service);
3523 if (found_service2 != pending_offers_.end()) {
3524 auto found_instance2 = found_service2->second.find(_instance);
3525 if (found_instance2 != found_service2->second.end()) {
3526 if(std::get<2>(found_instance2->second) == _client) {
3527 already_pinged = true;
3528 } else {
3529 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "routing_manager_impl::handle_local_offer_service: "
3530 << "rejecting service registration. Application: "
3531 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
3532 << std::setw(4) << _client << " is trying to offer ["
3533 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
3534 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
3535 << std::dec
3536 << static_cast<std::uint32_t>(_major) << "." << _minor
3537 << "] current pending offer by application: " << std::hex
3538 << std::setw(4) << its_stored_client << ": ["
3539 << std::hex
3540 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
3541 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
3542 << std::dec
3543 << static_cast<std::uint32_t>(its_stored_major)
3544 << "." << its_stored_minor << "]";
3545 return false;
3546 }
3547 }
3548 }
3549 }
3550 if (!already_pinged) {
3551 // find out endpoint of previously offering application
3552 auto its_old_endpoint = find_local(its_stored_client);
3553 if (its_old_endpoint) {
3554 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(pending_offers_mutex_);
3555 if (stub_ && stub_->send_ping(its_stored_client)) {
3556 pending_offers_[_service][_instance] =
3557 std::make_tuple(_major, _minor, _client,
3558 its_stored_client);
3559 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "OFFER("
3560 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
3561 << std::setw(4) << _client << "): ["
3562 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
3563 << std::setw(4) << _instance << ":"
3564 << std::dec << int(_major) << "." << std::dec << _minor
3565 << "] is now pending. Waiting for pong from application: "
3566 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << its_stored_client;
3567 return false;
3568 }
3569 } else if (its_stored_client == host_->get_client()) {
3570 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "routing_manager_impl::handle_local_offer_service: "
3571 << "rejecting service registration. Application: "
3572 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
3573 << std::setw(4) << _client << " is trying to offer ["
3574 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
3575 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
3576 << std::dec
3577 << static_cast<std::uint32_t>(_major) << "." << _minor
3578 << "] offered previously by routing manager stub itself with application: "
3579 << std::hex
3580 << std::setw(4) << its_stored_client << ": ["
3581 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
3582 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
3583 << std::dec
3584 << static_cast<std::uint32_t>(its_stored_major) << "." << its_stored_minor
3585 << "] which is still alive";
3586 return false;
3587 }
3588 } else {
3589 VSOMEIP_INFO << __func__
3590 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _client <<"): ["
3591 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _service << "."
3592 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << _instance
3593 << ":" << std::dec << int(_major) << "." << std::dec << _minor << "]"
3594 << " client already pinged!";
3595 return false;
3596 }
3597 } else {
3598 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "routing_manager_impl::handle_local_offer_service: "
3599 << "rejecting service registration. Application: "
3600 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
3601 << std::setw(4) << _client << " is trying to offer ["
3602 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
3603 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
3604 << std::dec
3605 << static_cast<std::uint32_t>(_major) << "." << _minor
3606 << "] offered previously by application: "
3607 << std::hex
3608 << std::setw(4) << its_stored_client << ": ["
3609 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
3610 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
3611 << std::dec
3612 << static_cast<std::uint32_t>(its_stored_major) << "." << its_stored_minor << "]";
3613 return false;
3614 }
3615 }
3616 }
3617
3618 // check if the same service instance is already offered remotely
3619 if (routing_manager_base::offer_service(_client, _service, _instance,
3620 _major, _minor)) {
3621 local_services_[_service][_instance] = std::make_tuple(_major,
3622 _minor, _client);
3623 } else {
3624 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "routing_manager_impl::handle_local_offer_service: "
3625 << "rejecting service registration. Application: "
3626 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
3627 << std::setw(4) << _client << " is trying to offer ["
3628 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
3629 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
3630 << std::dec
3631 << static_cast<std::uint32_t>(_major) << "." << _minor << "]"
3632 << "] already offered remotely";
3633 return false;
3634 }
3635 }
3636 return true;
3637}
3638
3639void routing_manager_impl::on_pong(client_t _client) {
3640 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(pending_offers_mutex_);
3641 if (pending_offers_.size() == 0) {
3642 return;
3643 }
3644 for (auto service_iter = pending_offers_.begin();
3645 service_iter != pending_offers_.end(); ) {
3646 for (auto instance_iter = service_iter->second.begin();
3647 instance_iter != service_iter->second.end(); ) {
3648 if (std::get<3>(instance_iter->second) == _client) {
3649 // received pong from an application were another application wants
3650 // to offer its service, delete the other applications offer as
3651 // the current offering application is still alive
3652 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "OFFER("
3653 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
3654 << std::setw(4) << std::get<2>(instance_iter->second) << "): ["
3655 << std::setw(4) << service_iter->first << "."
3656 << std::setw(4) << instance_iter->first << ":"
3657 << std::dec
3658 << std::uint32_t(std::get<0>(instance_iter->second))
3659 << "." << std::get<1>(instance_iter->second)
3660 << "] was rejected as application: "
3661 << std::hex
3662 << std::setw(4) << _client
3663 << " is still alive";
3664 instance_iter = service_iter->second.erase(instance_iter);
3665 } else {
3666 ++instance_iter;
3667 }
3668 }
3669
3670 if (service_iter->second.size() == 0) {
3671 service_iter = pending_offers_.erase(service_iter);
3672 } else {
3673 ++service_iter;
3674 }
3675 }
3676}
3677
3678void routing_manager_impl::register_client_error_handler(client_t _client,
3679 const std::shared_ptr<endpoint> &_endpoint) {
3680 _endpoint->register_error_handler(
3681 std::bind(&routing_manager_impl::handle_client_error, this, _client));
3682}
3683
3684void routing_manager_impl::handle_client_error(client_t _client) {
3685 VSOMEIP_INFO << "routing_manager_impl::" << __func__ << " Client 0x" << std::hex << get_client()
3686 << " handles a client error(" << std::hex << _client << ")";
3687 if (stub_)
3688 stub_->update_registration(_client, registration_type_e::DEREGISTER_ON_ERROR,
3689 boost::asio::ip::address(), 0);
3690
3691 std::forward_list<std::tuple<client_t, service_t, instance_t, major_version_t,
3692 minor_version_t>> its_offers;
3693 {
3694 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(pending_offers_mutex_);
3695 if (pending_offers_.size() == 0) {
3696 return;
3697 }
3698
3699 for (auto service_iter = pending_offers_.begin();
3700 service_iter != pending_offers_.end(); ) {
3701 for (auto instance_iter = service_iter->second.begin();
3702 instance_iter != service_iter->second.end(); ) {
3703 if (std::get<3>(instance_iter->second) == _client) {
3704 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "OFFER("
3705 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
3706 << std::setw(4) << std::get<2>(instance_iter->second) << "): ["
3707 << std::setw(4) << service_iter->first << "."
3708 << std::setw(4) << instance_iter->first << ":"
3709 << std::dec
3710 << std::uint32_t(std::get<0>(instance_iter->second))
3711 << "." << std::get<1>(instance_iter->second)
3712 << "] is not pending anymore as application: "
3713 << std::hex
3714 << std::setw(4) << std::get<3>(instance_iter->second)
3715 << " is dead. Offering again!";
3716 its_offers.push_front(std::make_tuple(
3717 std::get<2>(instance_iter->second),
3718 service_iter->first,
3719 instance_iter->first,
3720 std::get<0>(instance_iter->second),
3721 std::get<1>(instance_iter->second)));
3722 instance_iter = service_iter->second.erase(instance_iter);
3723 } else {
3724 ++instance_iter;
3725 }
3726 }
3727
3728 if (service_iter->second.size() == 0) {
3729 service_iter = pending_offers_.erase(service_iter);
3730 } else {
3731 ++service_iter;
3732 }
3733 }
3734 }
3735 for (const auto &offer : its_offers) {
3736 offer_service(std::get<0>(offer), std::get<1>(offer), std::get<2>(offer),
3737 std::get<3>(offer), std::get<4>(offer), true);
3738 }
3739}

3741std::shared_ptr<endpoint_manager_impl> routing_manager_impl::get_endpoint_manager() const {
3742 return ep_mgr_impl_;
3743}

3745void routing_manager_impl::send_subscribe(client_t _client, service_t _service,
3746 instance_t _instance, eventgroup_t _eventgroup, major_version_t _major,
3747 event_t _event, const std::shared_ptr<debounce_filter_impl_t> &_filter) {
3748 auto endpoint = ep_mgr_->find_local(_service, _instance);
3749 if (endpoint && stub_) {
3750 stub_->send_subscribe(endpoint, _client,
3751 _service, _instance,
3752 _eventgroup, _major,
3753 _event, _filter,
3754 PENDING_SUBSCRIPTION_ID);
3755 }

3757
3758void routing_manager_impl::set_routing_state(routing_state_e _routing_state) {
3759 {
3760 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(routing_state_mutex_);
3761 if (routing_state_ == _routing_state) {
3762 VSOMEIP_INFO << "rmi::" << __func__ << " No routing state change --> do nothing.";
3763 return;
3764 }
3765
3766 routing_state_ = _routing_state;
3767 }
3768
3769 if (discovery_) {
3770 switch (_routing_state) {
3771 case routing_state_e::RS_SUSPENDED:
3772 {
3773 VSOMEIP_INFO << "rmi::" << __func__ << " Set routing to suspend mode, diagnosis mode is "
3774 << ((discovery_->get_diagnosis_mode() == true) ? "active." : "inactive.");
3775
3776 // stop processing of incoming SD messages
3777 discovery_->stop();
3778
3779 VSOMEIP_INFO << "rmi::" << __func__ << " Inform all applications that we are going to suspend";
3780 send_suspend();
3781
3782 // remove all remote subscriptions to remotely offered services on this node
3783 expire_subscriptions(true);
3784
3785 std::vector<std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo>> _service_infos;
3786 // send StopOffer messages for remotely offered services on this node
3787 for (const auto &its_service : get_offered_services()) {
3788 for (const auto &its_instance : its_service.second) {
3789 bool has_reliable(its_instance.second->get_endpoint(true) != nullptr);
3790 bool has_unreliable(its_instance.second->get_endpoint(false) != nullptr);
3791 if (has_reliable || has_unreliable) {
3792 const client_t its_client(find_local_client(its_service.first, its_instance.first));
3793 if (its_client == VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT) {
3794 // Inconsistency between services_ and local_services_ table detected
3795 // --> cleanup.
3796 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "rmi::" << __func__ << " Found table inconsistency for ["
3797 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << its_service.first << "."
3798 << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << its_instance.first << "]";
3799
3800 del_routing_info(its_service.first, its_instance.first, has_reliable, has_unreliable);
3801
3802 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(pending_offers_mutex_);
3803 auto its_pending_offer = pending_offers_.find(its_service.first);
3804 if (its_pending_offer != pending_offers_.end())
3805 its_pending_offer->second.erase(its_instance.first);
3806
3807 // Remove the service from the offer_commands_ and prepare_stop_handlers_ to force the next offer to be processed
3808 offer_commands_.erase(std::make_pair(its_service.first, its_instance.first));
3809 if (has_reliable)
3810 its_instance.second->get_endpoint(true)->remove_stop_handler(its_service.first);
3811 if (has_unreliable)
3812 its_instance.second->get_endpoint(false)->remove_stop_handler(its_service.first);
3813 }
3814 VSOMEIP_WARNING << "Service "
3815 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
3816 << std::setw(4) << its_service.first << "."
3817 << std::setw(4) << its_instance.first << " still offered by "
3818 << std::setw(4) << its_client;
3819 }
3820 // collect stop offers to be sent out
3821 if (discovery_->stop_offer_service(its_instance.second, false)) {
3822 _service_infos.push_back(its_instance.second);
3823 }
3824 }
3825 }
3826 // send collected stop offers packed together in one ore multiple SD messages
3827 discovery_->send_collected_stop_offers(_service_infos);
3828 _service_infos.clear();
3829
3830 {
3831 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(remote_subscription_state_mutex_);
3832 remote_subscription_state_.clear();
3833 }
3834
3835 // send StopSubscribes and clear subscribed_ map
3836 discovery_->unsubscribe_all_on_suspend();
3837
3838 // mark all external services as offline
3839 services_t its_remote_services;
3840 {
3841 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(services_remote_mutex_);
3842 its_remote_services = services_remote_;
3843 }
3844 for (const auto &s : its_remote_services) {
3845 for (const auto &i : s.second) {
3846 const bool has_reliable(i.second->get_endpoint(true));
3847 const bool has_unreliable(i.second->get_endpoint(false));
3848 del_routing_info(s.first, i.first, has_reliable, has_unreliable);
3849
3850 // clear all cached payloads of remote services
3851 unset_all_eventpayloads(s.first, i.first);
3852 }
3853 }
3854
3855 VSOMEIP_INFO << "rmi::" << __func__ << " Set routing to suspend mode done, diagnosis mode is "
3856 << ((discovery_->get_diagnosis_mode() == true) ? "active." : "inactive.");
3857
3858 break;
3859 }
3860 case routing_state_e::RS_RESUMED:
3861 {
3862 VSOMEIP_INFO << "rmi::" << __func__ << " Set routing to resume mode, diagnosis mode was "
3863 << ((discovery_->get_diagnosis_mode() == true) ? "active." : "inactive.");
3864 {
3865 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(routing_state_mutex_);
3866 last_resume_ = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
3867 }
3868
3869 // Reset relevant in service info
3870 for (const auto &its_service : get_offered_services()) {
3871 for (const auto &its_instance : its_service.second) {
3872 its_instance.second->set_ttl(DEFAULT_TTL);
3873 its_instance.second->set_is_in_mainphase(false);
3874 }
3875 }
3876 // Switch SD back to normal operation
3877 discovery_->set_diagnosis_mode(false);
3878
3879 if (routing_state_handler_) {
3880 routing_state_handler_(_routing_state);
3881 }
3882
3883 // start processing of SD messages (incoming remote offers should lead to new subscribe messages)
3884 discovery_->start();
3885
3886 // Trigger initial offer phase for relevant services
3887 for (const auto &its_service : get_offered_services()) {
3888 for (const auto &its_instance : its_service.second) {
3889 discovery_->offer_service(its_instance.second);
3890 }
3891 }
3892
3893 VSOMEIP_INFO << "rmi::" << __func__ << " Set routing to resume mode done, diagnosis mode was "
3894 << ((discovery_->get_diagnosis_mode() == true) ? "active." : "inactive.");
3895 break;
3896 }
3897 case routing_state_e::RS_DIAGNOSIS:
3898 {
3899 VSOMEIP_INFO << "rmi::" << __func__ << " Set routing to diagnosis mode.";
3900 discovery_->set_diagnosis_mode(true);
3901
3902 // send StopOffer messages for all someip protocol services
3903 for (const auto &its_service : get_offered_services()) {
3904 for (const auto &its_instance : its_service.second) {
3905 if (host_->get_configuration()->is_someip(
3906 its_service.first, its_instance.first)) {
3907 discovery_->stop_offer_service(its_instance.second, true);
3908 }
3909 }
3910 }
3911
3912 VSOMEIP_INFO << "rmi::" << __func__ << " Set routing to diagnosis mode done.";
3913 break;
3914 }
3915 case routing_state_e::RS_RUNNING:
3916 VSOMEIP_INFO << "rmi::" << __func__ << " Set routing to running mode, diagnosis mode was "
3917 << ((discovery_->get_diagnosis_mode() == true) ? "active." : "inactive.");
3918
3919 // Reset relevant in service info
3920 for (const auto &its_service : get_offered_services()) {
3921 for (const auto &its_instance : its_service.second) {
3922 if (host_->get_configuration()->is_someip(
3923 its_service.first, its_instance.first)) {
3924 its_instance.second->set_ttl(DEFAULT_TTL);
3925 its_instance.second->set_is_in_mainphase(false);
3926 }
3927 }
3928 }
3929 // Switch SD back to normal operation
3930 discovery_->set_diagnosis_mode(false);
3931
3932 // Trigger initial phase for relevant services
3933 for (const auto &its_service : get_offered_services()) {
3934 for (const auto &its_instance : its_service.second) {
3935 if (host_->get_configuration()->is_someip(
3936 its_service.first, its_instance.first)) {
3937 discovery_->offer_service(its_instance.second);
3938 }
3939 }
3940 }
3941
3942 VSOMEIP_INFO << "rmi::" << __func__ << " Set routing to running mode done, diagnosis mode was "
3943 << ((discovery_->get_diagnosis_mode() == true) ? "active." : "inactive.");
3944 break;
3945 default:
3946 break;
3947 }
3948 }
3949}
3950
3951void routing_manager_impl::on_net_interface_or_route_state_changed(
3952 bool _is_interface, const std::string &_if, bool _available) {
3953 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(pending_sd_offers_mutex_);
3954 auto log_change_message = [&_if, _available, _is_interface](bool _warning) {
3955 std::stringstream ss;
3956 ss << (_is_interface ? "Network interface" : "Route") << " \"" << _if
3957 << "\" state changed: " << (_available ? "up" : "down");
3958 if (_warning) {
3959 VSOMEIP_WARNING << ss.str();
3960 } else {
3961 VSOMEIP_INFO << ss.str();
3962 }
3963 };
3964 if (_is_interface) {
3965 if (if_state_running_
3966 || (_available && !if_state_running_ && routing_running_)) {
3967 log_change_message(true);
3968 } else if (!if_state_running_) {
3969 log_change_message(false);
3970 }
3971 if (_available && !if_state_running_) {
3972 if_state_running_ = true;
3973 if (!routing_running_) {
3974 if(configuration_->is_sd_enabled()) {
3975 if (sd_route_set_) {
3976 start_ip_routing();
3977 }
3978 } else {
3979 // Static routing, don't wait for route!
3980 start_ip_routing();
3981 }
3982 }
3983 }
3984 } else {
3985 if (sd_route_set_
3986 || (_available && !sd_route_set_ && routing_running_)) {
3987 log_change_message(true);
3988 } else if (!sd_route_set_) {
3989 log_change_message(false);
3990 }
3991 if (_available && !sd_route_set_) {
3992 sd_route_set_ = true;
3993 if (!routing_running_) {
3994 if (if_state_running_) {
3995 start_ip_routing();
3996 }
3997 }
3998 }
3999 }
4000}
4001
4002void routing_manager_impl::start_ip_routing() {
4003#if defined(_WIN32) || defined(__QNX__)
4004 if_state_running_ = true;
4005#endif
4006
4007 if (routing_ready_handler_) {
4008 routing_ready_handler_();
4009 }
4010 if (discovery_) {
4011 discovery_->start();
4012 } else {
4013 init_routing_info();
4014 }
4015
4016 for (auto its_service : pending_sd_offers_) {
4017 init_service_info(its_service.first, its_service.second, true);
4018 }
4019 pending_sd_offers_.clear();
4020
4021 routing_running_ = true;
4022 VSOMEIP_INFO << VSOMEIP_ROUTING_READY_MESSAGE;
4023}
4024
4025void
4026routing_manager_impl::add_requested_service(client_t _client,
4027 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
4028 major_version_t _major, minor_version_t _minor) {
4029
4030 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> ist_lock(requested_services_mutex_);
4031 requested_services_[_service][_instance][_major][_minor].insert(_client);
4032}
4033
4034void
4035routing_manager_impl::remove_requested_service(client_t _client,
4036 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
4037 major_version_t _major, minor_version_t _minor) {
4038
4039 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> ist_lock(requested_services_mutex_);
4040
4041 using minor_map_t = std::map<minor_version_t, std::set<client_t> >;
4042 using major_map_t = std::map<major_version_t, minor_map_t>;
4043 using instance_map_t = std::map<instance_t, major_map_t>;
4044
4045 auto delete_client = [&_client](
4046 minor_map_t::iterator& _minor_iter,
4047 const major_map_t::iterator& _parent_major_iter) {
4048 if (_minor_iter->second.erase(_client)) { // client was requester
4049 if (_minor_iter->second.empty()) {
4050 // client was last requester of this minor version
4051 _minor_iter = _parent_major_iter->second.erase(_minor_iter);
4052 } else { // there are still other requesters of this minor version
4053 ++_minor_iter;
4054 }
4055 } else { // client wasn't requester
4056 ++_minor_iter;
4057 }
4058 };
4059
4060 auto handle_minor = [&_minor, &delete_client](
4061 major_map_t::iterator& _major_iter,
4062 const instance_map_t::iterator& _parent_instance_iter) {
4063 if (_minor == ANY_MINOR) {
4064 for (auto minor_iter = _major_iter->second.begin();
4065 minor_iter != _major_iter->second.end(); ) {
4066 delete_client(minor_iter, _major_iter);
4067 }
4068 } else {
4069 auto found_minor = _major_iter->second.find(_minor);
4070 if (found_minor != _major_iter->second.end()) {
4071 delete_client(found_minor, _major_iter);
4072 }
4073 }
4074 if (_major_iter->second.empty()) {
4075 // client was last requester of this major version
4076 _major_iter = _parent_instance_iter->second.erase(_major_iter);
4077 } else {
4078 ++_major_iter;
4079 }
4080 };
4081
4082 auto found_service = requested_services_.find(_service);
4083 if (found_service != requested_services_.end()) {
4084 auto found_instance = found_service->second.find(_instance);
4085 if (found_instance != found_service->second.end()) {
4086 if (_major == ANY_MAJOR) {
4087 for (auto major_iter = found_instance->second.begin();
4088 major_iter != found_instance->second.end();) {
4089 handle_minor(major_iter, found_instance);
4090 }
4091 } else {
4092 auto found_major = found_instance->second.find(_major);
4093 if (found_major != found_instance->second.end()) {
4094 handle_minor(found_major, found_instance);
4095 }
4096 }
4097 if (found_instance->second.empty()) {
4098 // client was last requester of this instance
4099 found_service->second.erase(found_instance);
4100 if (found_service->second.empty()) {
4101 // client was last requester of this service
4102 requested_services_.erase(found_service);
4103 }
4104 }
4105 }
4106 }
4107}
4108
4109std::vector<std::pair<service_t, instance_t> >
4110routing_manager_impl::get_requested_services(client_t _client) {
4111 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> ist_lock(requested_services_mutex_);
4112 std::vector<std::pair<service_t, instance_t>> its_requests;
4113 for (const auto& service : requested_services_) {
4114 for (const auto& instance : service.second) {
4115 bool requested = false;
4116 for (const auto& major : instance.second) {
4117 for (const auto& minor : major.second) {
4118 if (minor.second.find(_client) != minor.second.end()) {
4119 requested = true;
4120 break;
4121 }
4122 }
4123 if (requested) {
4124 break;
4125 }
4126 }
4127 if (requested) {
4128 its_requests.push_back(
4129 std::make_pair(service.first, instance.first));
4130 break;
4131 }
4132 }
4133 }
4134 return its_requests;
4135}
4136
4137std::set<client_t>
4138routing_manager_impl::get_requesters(service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
4139 major_version_t _major, minor_version_t _minor) {
4140
4141 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> ist_lock(requested_services_mutex_);
4142 return get_requesters_unlocked(_service, _instance, _major, _minor);
4143}
4144
4145std::set<client_t>
4146routing_manager_impl::get_requesters_unlocked(
4147 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
4148 major_version_t _major, minor_version_t _minor) {
4149
4150 std::set<client_t> its_requesters;
4151
4152 auto found_service = requested_services_.find(_service);
4153 if (found_service == requested_services_.end()) {
4154 found_service = requested_services_.find(ANY_SERVICE);
4155 if (found_service == requested_services_.end()) {
4156 return its_requesters;
4157 }
4158 }
4159
4160 auto found_instance = found_service->second.find(_instance);
4161 if (found_instance == found_service->second.end()) {
4162 found_instance = found_service->second.find(ANY_INSTANCE);
4163 if (found_instance == found_service->second.end()) {
4164 return its_requesters;
4165 }
4166 }
4167
4168 for (const auto& its_major : found_instance->second) {
4169 if (its_major.first == _major || _major == DEFAULT_MAJOR
4170 || its_major.first == ANY_MAJOR) {
4171 for (const auto &its_minor : its_major.second) {
4172 if (its_minor.first <= _minor
4173 || _minor == DEFAULT_MINOR
4174 || its_minor.first == ANY_MINOR) {
4175 if (its_requesters.empty()) {
4176 its_requesters = its_minor.second;
4177 } else {
4178 its_requesters.insert(its_minor.second.cbegin(),
4179 its_minor.second.cend());
4180 }
4181 }
4182 }
4183 }
4184 }
4185
4186 return its_requesters;
4187}
4188
4189bool
4190routing_manager_impl::has_requester_unlocked(
4191 service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
4192 major_version_t _major, minor_version_t _minor) {
4193
4194 auto found_service = requested_services_.find(_service);
4195 if (found_service == requested_services_.end()) {
4196 found_service = requested_services_.find(ANY_SERVICE);
4197 if (found_service == requested_services_.end()) {
4198 return false;
4199 }
4200 }
4201
4202 auto found_instance = found_service->second.find(_instance);
4203 if (found_instance == found_service->second.end()) {
4204 found_instance = found_service->second.find(ANY_INSTANCE);
4205 if (found_instance == found_service->second.end()) {
4206 return false;
4207 }
4208 }
4209
4210 for (const auto& its_major : found_instance->second) {
4211 if (its_major.first == _major || _major == DEFAULT_MAJOR
4212 || its_major.first == ANY_MAJOR) {
4213 for (const auto &its_minor : its_major.second) {
4214 if (its_minor.first <= _minor
4215 || _minor == DEFAULT_MINOR
4216 || its_minor.first == ANY_MINOR) {
4217
4218 return true;
4219 }
4220 }
4221 }
4222 }
4223
4224 return false;
4225}
4226
4227std::set<eventgroup_t>
4228routing_manager_impl::get_subscribed_eventgroups(
4229 service_t _service, instance_t _instance) {
4230 std::set<eventgroup_t> its_eventgroups;
4231
4232 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(eventgroups_mutex_);
4233 auto found_service = eventgroups_.find(_service);
4234 if (found_service != eventgroups_.end()) {
4235 auto found_instance = found_service->second.find(_instance);
4236 if (found_instance != found_service->second.end()) {
4237 for (const auto& its_group : found_instance->second) {
4238 for (const auto& its_event : its_group.second->get_events()) {
4239 if (its_event->has_subscriber(its_group.first, ANY_CLIENT)) {
4240 its_eventgroups.insert(its_group.first);
4241 }
4242 }
4243 }
4244 }
4245 }
4246
4247 return its_eventgroups;
4248}
4249
4250void routing_manager_impl::clear_targets_and_pending_sub_from_eventgroups(
4251 service_t _service, instance_t _instance) {
4252 std::vector<std::shared_ptr<event>> its_events;
4253 {
4254 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(eventgroups_mutex_);
4255 auto found_service = eventgroups_.find(_service);
4256 if (found_service != eventgroups_.end()) {
4257 auto found_instance = found_service->second.find(_instance);
4258 if (found_instance != found_service->second.end()) {
4259 for (const auto &its_eventgroup : found_instance->second) {
4260 // As the service is gone, all subscriptions to its events
4261 // do no longer exist and the last received payload is no
4262 // longer valid.
4263 for (auto &its_event : its_eventgroup.second->get_events()) {
4264 const auto its_subscribers = its_event->get_subscribers();
4265 for (const auto its_subscriber : its_subscribers) {
4266 if (its_subscriber != get_client()) {
4267 its_event->remove_subscriber(
4268 its_eventgroup.first, its_subscriber);
4269 }
4270
4271 client_t its_client = VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT; //is_specific_endpoint_client(its_subscriber, _service, _instance);
4272 {
4273 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(remote_subscription_state_mutex_);
4274 const auto its_tuple =
4275 std::make_tuple(found_service->first, found_instance->first,
4276 its_eventgroup.first, its_client);
4277 remote_subscription_state_.erase(its_tuple);
4278 }
4279 }
4280 its_events.push_back(its_event);
4281 }
4282 // TODO dn: find out why this was commented out
4283 //its_eventgroup.second->clear_targets();
4284 //its_eventgroup.second->clear_pending_subscriptions();
4285 }
4286 }
4287 }
4288 }
4289 for (const auto& e : its_events) {
4290 e->unset_payload(true);
4291 }
4292}
4293
4294void routing_manager_impl::clear_remote_subscriber(service_t _service,
4295 instance_t _instance) {
4296 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(remote_subscribers_mutex_);
4297 auto found_service = remote_subscribers_.find(_service);
4298 if (found_service != remote_subscribers_.end()) {
4299 if (found_service->second.erase(_instance) > 0 &&
4300 !found_service->second.size()) {
4301 remote_subscribers_.erase(found_service);
4302 }
4303 }
4304}
