4322
4323bool routing_manager_impl::create_placeholder_event_and_subscribe(
4324 service_t _service, instance_t _instance, eventgroup_t _eventgroup,
4325 event_t _event, const std::shared_ptr<debounce_filter_impl_t> &_filter,
4326 client_t _client) {
4327
4328 bool is_inserted(false);
4329 // we received a event which was not yet requested/offered
4330 // create a placeholder field until someone requests/offers this event with
4331 // full information like eventgroup, field or not etc.
4332 std::set<eventgroup_t> its_eventgroups({_eventgroup});
4333
4334 const client_t its_local_client(find_local_client(_service, _instance));
4335 if (its_local_client == host_->get_client()) {
4336 // received subscription for event of a service instance hosted by
4337 // application acting as rm_impl register with own client id and shadow = false
4338 register_event(host_->get_client(),
4339 _service, _instance,
4340 _event,
4341 its_eventgroups, event_type_e::ET_UNKNOWN, reliability_type_e::RT_UNKNOWN,
4342 std::chrono::milliseconds::zero(), false, true,
4343 nullptr, false, false, true);
4344 } else if (its_local_client != VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT) {
4345 // received subscription for event of a service instance hosted on
4346 // this node register with client id of local_client and set shadow to true
4347 register_event(its_local_client,
4348 _service, _instance,
4349 _event, its_eventgroups, event_type_e::ET_UNKNOWN,
4350 reliability_type_e::RT_UNKNOWN,
4351 std::chrono::milliseconds::zero(), false, true,
4352 nullptr, false, true, true);
4353 } else {
4354 // received subscription for event of a unknown or remote service instance
4355 std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> its_info = find_service(_service,
4356 _instance);
4357 if (its_info && !its_info->is_local()) {
4358 // remote service, register shadow event with client ID of subscriber
4359 // which should have called register_event
4360 register_event(_client,
4361 _service, _instance,
4362 _event, its_eventgroups, event_type_e::ET_UNKNOWN,
4363 reliability_type_e::RT_UNKNOWN,
4364 std::chrono::milliseconds::zero(),
4365 false, true, nullptr, false, true, true);
4366 } else {
4367 VSOMEIP_WARNING
4368 << "routing_manager_impl::create_placeholder_event_and_subscribe("
4369 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
4370 << std::setw(4) << _client << "): ["
4371 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
4372 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
4373 << std::setw(4) << _eventgroup << "."
4374 << std::setw(4) << _event << "]"
4375 << " received subscription for unknown service instance.";
4376 }
4377 }
4378
4379 std::shared_ptr<event> its_event = find_event(_service, _instance, _event);
4380 if (its_event) {
4381 is_inserted = its_event->add_subscriber(
4382 _eventgroup, _filter, _client, false);
4383 }
4384 return is_inserted;
4385}
4386
4387void routing_manager_impl::handle_subscription_state(
4388 client_t _client, service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
4389 eventgroup_t _eventgroup, event_t _event) {
4390#if 0
4391 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "routing_manager_impl::" << __func__
4392 << "(" << std::hex << _client << "): "
4393 << "event="
4394 << std::hex << _service << "."
4395 << std::hex << _instance << "."
4396 << std::hex << _eventgroup << "."
4397 << std::hex << _event
4398 << " me="
4399 << std::hex << get_client();
4400#endif
4401 // Note: remote_subscription_state_mutex_ is already locked as this
4402 // method builds a critical section together with insert_subscription
4403 // from routing_manager_base.
4404 // Todo: Improve this situation...
4405 auto its_event = find_event(_service, _instance, _event);
4406 client_t its_client(VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT);
4407 if (its_event &&
4408 its_event->get_type() == event_type_e::ET_SELECTIVE_EVENT) {
4409 its_client = _client;
4410 }
4411
4412 auto its_tuple
4413 = std::make_tuple(_service, _instance, _eventgroup, its_client);
4414 auto its_state = remote_subscription_state_.find(its_tuple);
4415 if (its_state != remote_subscription_state_.end()) {
4416#if 0
4417 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "routing_manager_impl::" << __func__
4418 << "(" << std::hex << _client << "): "
4419 << "event="
4420 << std::hex << _service << "."
4421 << std::hex << _instance << "."
4422 << std::hex << _eventgroup << "."
4423 << std::hex << _event
4424 << " state=" << std::hex << (int)its_state->second
4425 << " me="
4426 << std::hex << get_client();
4427#endif
4428 if (its_state->second == subscription_state_e::SUBSCRIPTION_ACKNOWLEDGED) {
4429 // Subscription already acknowledged!
4430 if (_client == get_client()) {
4431 host_->on_subscription_status(_service, _instance, _eventgroup, _event, 0x0 /*OK*/);
4432 } else if (stub_) {
4433 stub_->send_subscribe_ack(_client, _service, _instance, _eventgroup, _event);
4434 }
4435 }
4436 }
4437}

4469
4470void routing_manager_impl::memory_log_timer_cbk(
4471 boost::system::error_code const & _error) {
4472 if (_error) {
4473 return;
4474 }
4475
4476#if defined(__linux__) || defined(ANDROID) || defined(__QNX__)
4477 static const std::uint32_t its_pagesize = static_cast<std::uint32_t>(getpagesize() / 1024);
4478
4479 std::FILE *its_file = std::fopen("/proc/self/statm", "r");
4480 if (!its_file) {
4481 VSOMEIP_ERROR << "memory_log_timer_cbk: couldn't open:"
4482 << std::string(std::strerror(errno));
4483 return;
4484 }
4485 std::uint64_t its_size(0);
4486 std::uint64_t its_rsssize(0);
4487 std::uint64_t its_sharedpages(0);
4488 std::uint64_t its_text(0);
4489 std::uint64_t its_lib(0);
4490 std::uint64_t its_data(0);
4491 std::uint64_t its_dirtypages(0);
4492
4493 if (EOF == std::fscanf(its_file, "%" PRIu64 "%" PRIu64 "%" PRIu64 "%" PRIu64 "%" PRIu64 "%" PRIu64 "%" PRIu64, &its_size,
4494 &its_rsssize, &its_sharedpages, &its_text, &its_lib,
4495 &its_data, &its_dirtypages)) {
4496 VSOMEIP_ERROR<< "memory_log_timer_cbk: error reading:"
4497 << std::string(std::strerror(errno));
4498 }
4499 std::fclose(its_file);
4500
4501 struct timespec cputs, monots;
4502 clock_gettime(CLOCK_PROCESS_CPUTIME_ID, &cputs);
4503 clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &monots);
4504
4505 VSOMEIP_INFO << "memory usage: "
4506 << "VmSize " << std::dec << its_size * its_pagesize << " kB, "
4507 << "VmRSS " << std::dec << its_rsssize * its_pagesize << " kB, "
4508 << "shared pages " << std::dec << its_sharedpages * its_pagesize << " kB, "
4509 << "text " << std::dec << its_text * its_pagesize << " kB, "
4510 << "data " << std::dec << its_data * its_pagesize << " kB "
4511 << "| monotonic time: " << std::dec << monots.tv_sec << "."
4512 << std::dec << monots.tv_nsec << " cpu time: "
4513 << std::dec << cputs.tv_sec << "." << std::dec << cputs.tv_nsec
4514 ;
4515#endif
4516
4517 {
4518 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(memory_log_timer_mutex_);
4519 boost::system::error_code ec;
4520 memory_log_timer_.expires_from_now(std::chrono::seconds(
4521 configuration_->get_log_memory_interval()), ec);
4522 memory_log_timer_.async_wait(
4523 std::bind(&routing_manager_impl::memory_log_timer_cbk, this,
4524 std::placeholders::_1));
4525 }
4526}
4527
4528void routing_manager_impl::status_log_timer_cbk(
4529 boost::system::error_code const & _error) {
4530 if (_error) {
4531 return;
4532 }
4533
4534 ep_mgr_impl_->print_status();
4535 {
4536 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(status_log_timer_mutex_);
4537 boost::system::error_code ec;
4538 status_log_timer_.expires_from_now(std::chrono::seconds(
4539 configuration_->get_log_status_interval()), ec);

4545
4546void
4547routing_manager_impl::on_unsubscribe_ack(client_t _client,
4548 service_t _service, instance_t _instance, eventgroup_t _eventgroup,
4549 remote_subscription_id_t _id) {
4550 std::shared_ptr<eventgroupinfo> its_info
4551 = find_eventgroup(_service, _instance, _eventgroup);
4552 if (its_info) {
4553 update_remote_subscription_mutex_.lock();
4554 const auto its_subscription = its_info->get_remote_subscription(_id);
4555 if (its_subscription) {
4556 its_info->remove_remote_subscription(_id);
4557
4558 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(remote_subscribers_mutex_);
4559 remote_subscribers_[_service][_instance].erase(_client);
4560
4561 if (its_info->get_remote_subscriptions().size() == 0) {
4562 for (const auto &its_event : its_info->get_events()) {
4563 bool has_remote_subscriber(false);
4564 for (const auto &its_eventgroup : its_event->get_eventgroups()) {
4565 const auto its_eventgroup_info
4566 = find_eventgroup(_service, _instance, its_eventgroup);
4567 if (its_eventgroup_info
4568 && its_eventgroup_info->get_remote_subscriptions().size() > 0) {
4569 has_remote_subscriber = true;
4570 }
4571 }
4572
4573 if (!has_remote_subscriber && its_event->is_shadow()) {
4574 its_event->unset_payload();
4575 }
4576 }
4577 }
4578 } else {
4579 VSOMEIP_ERROR << __func__
4580 << ": Unknown StopSubscribe " << std::dec << _id << " for eventgroup ["
4581 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
4582 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
4583 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
4584 << std::setw(4) << _eventgroup << "]";
4585 }
4586 update_remote_subscription_mutex_.unlock();
4587 } else {
4588 VSOMEIP_ERROR << __func__
4589 << ": Received StopSubscribe for unknown eventgroup: ("
4590 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
4591 << std::setw(4) << _client << "): ["
4592 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
4593 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "."
4594 << std::setw(4) << _eventgroup << "]";
4595 }
4596}

4604void routing_manager_impl::send_subscription(
4605 const client_t _offering_client,
4606 const service_t _service, const instance_t _instance,
4607 const eventgroup_t _eventgroup, const major_version_t _major,
4608 const std::set<client_t> &_clients,
4609 const remote_subscription_id_t _id) {
4610 if (host_->get_client() == _offering_client) {
4611 auto self = shared_from_this();
4612 for (const auto its_client : _clients) {
4613 host_->on_subscription(_service, _instance, _eventgroup, its_client,
4614 get_sec_client(), get_env(its_client), true,
4615 [this, self, _service, _instance, _eventgroup, its_client, _id]
4616 (const bool _is_accepted) {
4617 try {
4618 if (!_is_accepted) {
4619 const auto its_callback = std::bind(
4620 &routing_manager_stub_host::on_subscribe_nack,
4621 std::dynamic_pointer_cast<routing_manager_stub_host>(shared_from_this()),
4622 its_client, _service, _instance,
4623 _eventgroup, false, _id);
4624 io_.post(its_callback);
4625 } else {
4626 const auto its_callback = std::bind(
4627 &routing_manager_stub_host::on_subscribe_ack,
4628 std::dynamic_pointer_cast<routing_manager_stub_host>(shared_from_this()),
4629 its_client, _service, _instance,
4630 _eventgroup, ANY_EVENT, _id);
4631 io_.post(its_callback);
4632 }
4633 } catch (const std::exception &e) {
4634 VSOMEIP_ERROR << __func__ << e.what();
4635 }
4636 });
4637 }
4638 } else { // service hosted by local client
4639 for (const auto its_client : _clients) {
4640 if (stub_ && !stub_->send_subscribe(find_local(_offering_client), its_client,
4641 _service, _instance, _eventgroup, _major, ANY_EVENT, nullptr, _id)) {
4642 try {
4643 const auto its_callback = std::bind(
4644 &routing_manager_stub_host::on_subscribe_nack,
4645 std::dynamic_pointer_cast<routing_manager_stub_host>(shared_from_this()),
4646 its_client, _service, _instance, _eventgroup,
4647 true, _id);
4648 io_.post(its_callback);
4649 } catch (const std::exception &e) {
4650 VSOMEIP_ERROR << __func__ << e.what();
4651 }
4652 }
4653 }
4654 }
4655}
4656
4657void routing_manager_impl::cleanup_server_endpoint(
4658 service_t _service, const std::shared_ptr<endpoint>& _endpoint) {
4659 if (_endpoint) {
4660 // Clear service_instances_, check whether any service still
4661 // uses this endpoint and clear server endpoint if no service
4662 // remains using it
4663 if (ep_mgr_impl_->remove_instance(_service, _endpoint.get())) {
4664 if (ep_mgr_impl_->remove_server_endpoint(
4665 _endpoint->get_local_port(), _endpoint->is_reliable())) {
4666 // Stop endpoint (close socket) to release its async_handlers!
4667 _endpoint->stop();
4668 }
4669 }
4670 }
4671}
4672
4673pending_remote_offer_id_t routing_manager_impl::pending_remote_offer_add(
4674 service_t _service, instance_t _instance) {
4675 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(pending_remote_offers_mutex_);
4676 if (++pending_remote_offer_id_ == 0) {
4677 pending_remote_offer_id_++;
4678 }
4679 pending_remote_offers_[pending_remote_offer_id_] = std::make_pair(_service,
4680 _instance);
4681 return pending_remote_offer_id_;
4682}
4683
4684std::pair<service_t, instance_t> routing_manager_impl::pending_remote_offer_remove(
4685 pending_remote_offer_id_t _id) {
4686 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(pending_remote_offers_mutex_);
4687 std::pair<service_t, instance_t> ret = std::make_pair(ANY_SERVICE,
4688 ANY_INSTANCE);
4689 auto found_si = pending_remote_offers_.find(_id);
4690 if (found_si != pending_remote_offers_.end()) {
4691 ret = found_si->second;
4692 pending_remote_offers_.erase(found_si);
4693 }
4694 return ret;
4695}
4696
4697void routing_manager_impl::on_resend_provided_events_response(
4698 pending_remote_offer_id_t _id) {
4699 const std::pair<service_t, instance_t> its_service =
4700 pending_remote_offer_remove(_id);
4701 if (its_service.first != ANY_SERVICE) {
4702 // create server endpoint
4703 std::shared_ptr<serviceinfo> its_info = find_service(its_service.first,
4704 its_service.second);
4705 if (its_info) {
4706 its_info->set_ttl(DEFAULT_TTL);
4707 init_service_info(its_service.first, its_service.second, true);
4708 }
4709 }

4717void routing_manager_impl::service_endpoint_connected(
4718 service_t _service, instance_t _instance, major_version_t _major,
4719 minor_version_t _minor, const std::shared_ptr<endpoint>& _endpoint,
4720 bool _unreliable_only) {
4721
4722 if (!_unreliable_only) {
4723 // Mark only TCP-only and TCP+UDP services available here
4724 // UDP-only services are already marked as available in add_routing_info
4725 on_availability(_service, _instance,
4726 availability_state_e::AS_AVAILABLE,
4727 _major, _minor);
4728 if (stub_)
4729 stub_->on_offer_service(VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT, _service, _instance,
4730 _major, _minor);
4731 }
4732
4733 std::shared_ptr<boost::asio::steady_timer> its_timer =
4734 std::make_shared<boost::asio::steady_timer>(io_);
4735 boost::system::error_code ec;
4736 its_timer->expires_from_now(std::chrono::milliseconds(3), ec);
4737 if (!ec) {
4738 its_timer->async_wait(
4739 std::bind(&routing_manager_impl::call_sd_endpoint_connected,
4740 std::static_pointer_cast<routing_manager_impl>(
4741 shared_from_this()), std::placeholders::_1,
4742 _service, _instance, _endpoint, its_timer));
4743 } else {
4744 VSOMEIP_ERROR << __func__ << " " << ec.message();
4745 }
4746}

4748void routing_manager_impl::service_endpoint_disconnected(
4749 service_t _service, instance_t _instance, major_version_t _major,
4750 minor_version_t _minor, const std::shared_ptr<endpoint>& _endpoint) {
4751 (void)_endpoint;
4752 on_availability(_service, _instance,
4753 availability_state_e::AS_UNAVAILABLE,
4754 _major, _minor);
4755 if (stub_)
4756 stub_->on_stop_offer_service(VSOMEIP_ROUTING_CLIENT, _service, _instance,
4757 _major, _minor);
4758 VSOMEIP_WARNING << __func__ << ": lost connection to remote service: ["
4759 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
4760 << std::setw(4) << _service << "."
4761 << std::setw(4) << _instance << "]";

4864
4865bool routing_manager_impl::insert_event_statistics(service_t _service, instance_t _instance,
4866 method_t _method, length_t _length) {
4867
4868 static uint32_t its_max_messages = configuration_->get_statistics_max_messages();
4869 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(message_statistics_mutex_);
4870 const auto its_tuple = std::make_tuple(_service, _instance, _method);
4871 const auto its_main_s = message_statistics_.find(its_tuple);
4872 if (its_main_s != message_statistics_.end()) {
4873 // increase counter and calculate moving average for payload length
4874 its_main_s->second.avg_length_ =
4875 (its_main_s->second.avg_length_ * its_main_s->second.counter_ + _length) /
4876 (its_main_s->second.counter_ + 1);
4877 its_main_s->second.counter_++;
4878
4879 if (its_tuple == message_to_discard_) {
4880 // check list for entry with least counter value
4881 uint32_t its_min_count(0xFFFFFFFF);
4882 auto its_tuple_to_discard = std::make_tuple(0xFFFF, 0xFFFF, 0xFFFF);
4883 for (const auto &s : message_statistics_) {
4884 if (s.second.counter_ < its_min_count) {
4885 its_min_count = s.second.counter_;
4886 its_tuple_to_discard = s.first;
4887 }
4888 }
4889 if (its_min_count != 0xFFFF
4890 && its_min_count < its_main_s->second.counter_) {
4891 // update message to discard with current message
4892 message_to_discard_ = its_tuple;
4893 }
4894 }
4895 } else {
4896 if (message_statistics_.size() < its_max_messages) {
4897 message_statistics_[its_tuple] = {1, _length};
4898 message_to_discard_ = its_tuple;
4899 } else {
4900 // no slot empty
4901 const auto it = message_statistics_.find(message_to_discard_);
4902 if (it != message_statistics_.end()
4903 && it->second.counter_ == 1) {
4904 message_statistics_.erase(message_to_discard_);
4905 message_statistics_[its_tuple] = {1, _length};
4906 message_to_discard_ = its_tuple;
4907 } else {
4908 // ignore message
4909 ignored_statistics_counter_++;
4910 return false;
4911 }
4912 }
4913 }
4914 return true;
4915}
4916
4917void routing_manager_impl::statistics_log_timer_cbk(boost::system::error_code const & _error) {
4918 if (!_error) {
4919 static uint32_t its_interval = configuration_->get_statistics_interval();
4920 its_interval = its_interval >= 1000 ? its_interval : 1000;
4921 static uint32_t its_min_freq = configuration_->get_statistics_min_freq();
4922 std::stringstream its_log;
4923 {
4924 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(message_statistics_mutex_);
4925 for (const auto &s : message_statistics_) {
4926 if (s.second.counter_ / (its_interval / 1000) > its_min_freq) {
4927 uint16_t its_subscribed(0);
4928 std::shared_ptr<event> its_event = find_event(std::get<0>(s.first), std::get<1>(s.first), std::get<2>(s.first));
4929 if (its_event) {
4930 if (!its_event->is_provided()) {
4931 its_subscribed = static_cast<std::uint16_t>(its_event->get_subscribers().size());
4932 }
4933 }
4934 its_log << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
4935 << std::setw(4) << std::get<0>(s.first) << "."
4936 << std::get<1>(s.first) << "."
4937 << std::get<2>(s.first) << ": #="
4938 << std::dec << s.second.counter_ << " L="
4939 << s.second.avg_length_ << " S="
4940 << std::dec << its_subscribed << ", ";
4941 }
4942 }
4943
4944 if (ignored_statistics_counter_) {
4945 its_log << std::dec << " #ignored: " << ignored_statistics_counter_;
4946 }
4947
4948 message_statistics_.clear();
4949 message_to_discard_ = std::make_tuple(0x00, 0x00, 0x00);
4950 ignored_statistics_counter_ = 0;
4951 }
4952
4953 if (its_log.str().length() > 0) {
4954 VSOMEIP_INFO << "Received events statistics: [" << its_log.str() << "]";
4955 }
4956
4957 {
4958 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(statistics_log_timer_mutex_);
4959 statistics_log_timer_.expires_from_now(std::chrono::milliseconds(its_interval));
4960 statistics_log_timer_.async_wait(
4961 std::bind(&routing_manager_impl::statistics_log_timer_cbk,
4962 this, std::placeholders::_1));
4963 }
4964 }
4965}

5002
5003void
5004routing_manager_impl::remove_subscriptions(port_t _local_port,
5005 const boost::asio::ip::address &_remote_address,
5006 port_t _remote_port) {
5007
5008 std::map<service_t,
5009 std::map<instance_t,
5010 std::map<eventgroup_t,
5011 std::shared_ptr<eventgroupinfo> > > >its_eventgroups;
5012 {
5013 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> its_lock(eventgroups_mutex_);
5014 its_eventgroups = eventgroups_;
5015 }
5016 for (const auto &its_service : its_eventgroups) {
5017 for (const auto &its_instance : its_service.second) {
5018 for (const auto &its_eventgroup : its_instance.second) {
5019 const auto its_info = its_eventgroup.second;
5020 for (auto its_subscription
5021 : its_info->get_remote_subscriptions()) {
5022 auto its_definition = its_subscription->get_reliable();
5023 if (its_definition
5024 && its_definition->get_address() == _remote_address
5025 && its_definition->get_port() == _remote_port
5026 && its_definition->get_remote_port() == _local_port) {
5027
5028 VSOMEIP_INFO << __func__
5029 << ": Removing subscription to ["
5030 << std::hex << std::setfill('0')
5031 << std::setw(4) << its_info->get_service() << "."
5032 << std::setw(4) << its_info->get_instance() << "."
5033 << std::setw(4) << its_info->get_eventgroup()
5034 << "] from target "
5035 << its_definition->get_address() << ":"
5036 << std::dec << its_definition->get_port()
5037 << " reliable=true";
5038
5039 on_remote_unsubscribe(its_subscription);
5040 }
5041 }
5042 }
5043 }
5044 }
5045}
